Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained while grappled. The behir can grapple two creatures at once.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The behir breathes a line of lightning 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Creatures in the area make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 56 (16d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Vengeful Breath (1/Day
reaction.text: When struck by a melee attack, the behir immediately recharges and uses Lightning Breath, including the attacker in the area of effect.

reaction.name: Blindness (1/Day)
reaction.text: When struck by a ranged or area attack by a creature within 60 feet that it can see, the behir forces the attacker to make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is magically blinded for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Invisibility (1/Day)
reaction.text: When damaged by an attack, the behir magically becomes invisible for 1 minute or until it makes an attack.

reaction.name: Drain Charge (1/Day)
reaction.text: When subjected to lightning damage, the behir takes no damage, and the attacker or caster takes necrotic damage equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Bloodied Frenzy
trait.text: While the berserker is bloodied, they make all attacks with advantage and all attacks against them are made with advantage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: The berserkers AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Constitution modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The berserker attacks twice.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Handaxe
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Berserkers are lightly-armored and heavily-armed shock troops
action.text: In battle they tend to prefer charges and heroic single combats over formations and disciplined marches.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear attacks once with its bite and once with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

monster.name: Black Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

trait.name: Ambusher
trait.text: When submerged in water, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales sizzling acid in a 20-foot-long 5-foot-wide line. Each creature in that area makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw taking 13 (3d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Black Pudding - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

trait.name: Amorphous
trait.text: The pudding can pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Body
trait.text: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet takes 9 (2d8) acid damage. A nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the black pudding corrodes after dealing damage, taking a permanent -1 penalty to damage rolls per hit. If this penalty reaches -5, the weapon is destroyed. Wooden or metal nonmagical ammunition is destroyed after dealing damage. Any other metal or organic object that touches it takes 9 (2d8) acid damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The pudding can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the pudding has disadvantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
trait.text: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. Nonmagical armor worn by the target corrodes taking a permanent -1 penalty to its AC protection per hit. If the penalty reduces the armors AC protection to 10 the armor is destroyed.

reaction.name: Split
reaction.text: When a Medium or larger pudding with at least 10 hit points is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two puddings that are each one size smaller. Each new pudding has half the originals hit points (rounded down).

trait.name: Aura of Anger
trait.text: While the knight is conscious, allies within 10 feet gain a +2 bonus to melee weapon damage. A creature can benefit from only one Aura of Anger at a time.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight attacks three times with their greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Lance (Mounted Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage. If the knight moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack they deal an extra 13 (2d12) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. This attack is made at disadvantage against targets within 5 feet.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 100/400 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Vile Curse (1/Day)
action.text: The knight utters hellish words that scald the soul. Living creatures of the knights choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand them are magically cursed for 1 minute. A d4 is subtracted from attack rolls and saving throws made by a cursed creature. A creature immune to the frightened condition is immune to this curse.

action.name: Blackguards rule baronies and command undead and other sinister forces
action.text: Some are forsworn holy knights while others are armored brutes who serve supernatural villains.

monster.name: Blink Dog - a5e
monster.languages: Blink Dog, understands but cant speak Sylvan

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The blink dog has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The hawk has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The hawk has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hawks allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage.

monster.name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.speed: 30 ft., Burrow: 15 ft., Fly: 60 ft., Swim: 15 ft.
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 12

trait.name: Desert Farer
trait.text: The dragon ignores difficult terrain or obscurement caused by sand or gravel, even while flying. Additionally, it ignores the effects of extreme heat.

trait.name: Dune Splitter
trait.text: The dragon can remain submerged in sand and gravel for up to 4 hours. It has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in this way.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales a 30-foot-long 5-foot-wide line of lightning. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Day)
trait.text: If the boar takes 5 or less damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is instead reduced to 1 hit point.

action.name: Tusk
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage. If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The boggard can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
trait.text: The boggard can communicate with frogs and toads.

action.name: Vaulting Leap
action.text: The boggard jumps up to its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks. If its within 5 feet of a creature at the end of this movement it may make a melee spear attack against that creature with advantage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The boggard can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
trait.text: The boggard can communicate with frogs and toads.

action.name: Vaulting Leap
action.text: The boggard jumps up to its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks. If its within 5 feet of a creature at the end of this movement it may make a melee spear attack against that creature with advantage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The boggard can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
trait.text: The boggard can communicate with frogs and toads.

action.name: Parting Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. On a hit the boggard may jump up to its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Incite Frenzy (1/Day)
action.text: Each boggard and frog with a Bite attack within 60 feet may use its reaction to make a Bite attack.

action.name: Earthshaking Croak (1/Day)
action.text: Each non-frog and non-boggard creature within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw taking 14 (4d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Frog Guardians (1/Day)
action.text: The boggard magically summons two Medium frog guardians which wriggle from the ground in an empty space within 30 feet. They follow the boggards orders and disappear after 1 minute. They have the statistics of boggards except they have Intelligence 2 have no spear attack and can make a bite attack as part of their Vaulting Leap.

monster.name: Bolt-Thrower - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond that range), passive Perception 14

trait.name: Clockwork Sights
trait.text: The bolt-thrower does not have disadvantage on attack rolls when making ranged attacks within 5 feet of a hostile creature.

trait.name: Rooted
trait.text: The bolt-thrower can use a bonus action to anchor itself to or detach itself from a surface. While anchored, the bolt-throwers Speed is 0, and a DC 20 Strength check is required to detach it. A bolt-thrower cannot use its heavy crossbow unless it is anchored.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bolt-thrower attacks once with each of its crossbows.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit range 100/400 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Bone Devil - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Barbed Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the attack is a melee attack against a creature the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends the devil can't use its barbed spear on another target.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Invisibility
action.text: The devil magically turns invisible along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the devil makes an attack falls unconscious or dismisses the effect.

monster.name: Brass Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

trait.name: Self-Sufficient
trait.text: The brass dragon can subsist on only a quart of water and a pound of food per day.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Molten Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales molten glass in a 20-foot-long 5-foot-wide line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 saving throw taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Sleep Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure a creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

monster.name: Bronze Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Lightning Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot-long 5-foot-wide line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Ocean Surge
action.text: The dragon exhales a torrent of seawater in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the bear can't attack a different target with its claws.

action.name: Strangle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 10 ft. one Medium or smaller creature that is surprised grappled by the bugbear or that can't see the bugbear. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is pulled 5 feet towards the bugbear and grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends the bugbear automatically hits with the Strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage or 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

action.name: Stealthy Sneak
action.text: The bugbear moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then attempt to hide.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bugbear chief makes two attacks.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage or 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage or 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

action.name: Move Out (1/Day)
action.text: The bugbear and creatures of its choice within 30 feet move up to half their Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Bulette - a5e
monster.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 13

trait.name: Steely Hide
trait.text: If a creature targets the bulette with a melee attack using a nonmagical weapon and rolls a natural 1 on the attack roll, the weapon breaks.

action.name: Leap (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The bulette leaps up to half its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks and can land in a space containing one or more creatures. Each creature in its space when it lands makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and being knocked prone on a failure. On a success the creature takes half damage and is pushed 5 feet to a space of its choice. If that space is occupied the creature is knocked prone.

action.name: Burrow
action.text: The bulette burrows under the ground without provoking opportunity attacks moves up to its burrow speed and then resurfaces in an unoccupied space. If it is within 5 feet of a creature it then makes a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Jaw Clamp (1/Day)
reaction.text: When an attacker within 5 feet of the bulette misses it with a melee attack, the bulette makes a bite attack against the attacker. On a hit, the attacker is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the grappled creature is restrained, and the only attack the bulette can make is a bite against the grappled creature.

reaction.name: Hard Carapace (1/Day)
reaction.text: After taking damage from an attack, the bulette lies down and closes its eyes, protecting all vulnerable spots. Until the beginning of its next turn, its AC becomes 21 and it has advantage on saving throws.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: The bunyip has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The bunyip can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The bunyip has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bunyip makes a bite attack and two slam attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 19 (2d12+6) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the bunyip can't bite another target.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (2d10+6) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Cambion - a5e
monster.resist: cold, fire, poison; damage from nonmagical weapons

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The cambion makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Black Iron Blade
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage and the target takes a wound that deals 5 (1d10) ongoing slashing damage. A creature can end the ongoing damage by staunching the wound as an action or by giving the target magical healing.

action.name: Fire Blast
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit range 60 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Escape (1/Day)
action.text: The cambion magically creates a fiery portal to the realm of its fiendish parent. The portal appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The portal lasts until the end of the cambions next turn or until it passes through the portal. No one but the cambion can pass through the portal; anyone else that enters its space takes 14 (4d6) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The cat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Safe Landing
trait.text: The cat takes no falling damage from the first 10 feet that it falls.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points the target takes no damage from this attack.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d4+5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the bear can't attack a different target with its claws.

trait.name: Elite Recovery
trait.text: At the end of each of its turns while bloodied, the ogre can end one condition or effect on itself. It can do this even when unconscious or incapacitated.

action.name: Greatclub
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Sweeping Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. all creatures within 5 feet. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed 10 feet away from the ogre.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The troll has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes radiant damage or is exposed to sunlight, this trait doesnt function on its next turn. The troll is petrified if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesnt regenerate.

trait.name: Severed Limbs
trait.text: If the troll is dealt a critical hit with a slashing weapon, one of its extremities is severed. The extremity has AC 15, 10 hit points, a Speed of 10, and the trolls Regeneration trait. The troll controls the severed extremity and perceives through it with the appropriate senses (for instance, it sees through the eyes of its severed head). As a bonus action, the troll can reattach the extremity. While the troll is missing the extremity, its maximum hit points are reduced by 10. Roll d6 to determine the severed extremity:

trait.name: 1-4: Arm
trait.text: If the troll has an arm, it loses an arm. It loses one of its claw attacks, and the severed arm can make a claw attack.

trait.name: 5-6: Head
trait.text: If the troll has a head, it loses its head. It loses its bite attack, and the severed head can make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The troll attacks with its bite and twice with its claw. When the troll uses Multiattack it can make a rock attack in place of one claw attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The centaur attacks with its pike and its hooves.

action.name: Pike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage the centaurs movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the centaurs turn.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadeye Shot (1/Day)
action.text: The centaur makes a shortbow attack with advantage.

monster.name: Chain Devil - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Rattling Chains
trait.text: Whenever the devil moves, the rattling of its chains can be heard up to 300 feet away, unless it moves at half its Speed.

trait.name: Relentless Tracker
trait.text: Once the devil has grappled a creature in its chains, it has advantage on ability checks made to track that creature for the next 30 days.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The chain devil makes two chain attacks and commands up to two animated chains under its control to make chain attacks.

action.name: Chain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 16) and restrained. Until the grapple ends this chain can only attack the grappled target.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
reaction.text: When damaged by a creature within 30 feet that can see the devil, the devil momentarily assumes the magical illusory form of one of the attackers enemies or loved ones, alive or dead. The illusory figure may speak words that only the attacker can hear. The attacker makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and is frightened until the end of its next turn.The attacker is then immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Animate Chain
reaction.text: One inanimate, unattended chain within 60 feet sprouts blades and magically animates under the devils control for 1 hour. It has AC 20 and 20 hit points, a Speed of 0, and immunity to psychic, piercing, poison, and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack, the devil may command the chain to make one Chain attack against a target within 15 feet of it. If the chain is reduced to 0 hit points, it can't be reanimated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The warrior attacks twice.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage. If the warrior has moved this turn this attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Champion warriors are the champions and chiefs who lead lightly-armed warriors on skirmishes and raids

trait.name: Reactive Heads
trait.text: The chimera can take three reactions per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Three Heads
trait.text: The chimera has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

trait.name: Wakeful
trait.text: When one of the chimeras heads is asleep, the others are awake.

action.name: Headbutt
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage or 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage against a prone target.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon head breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Tail Swipe (1/Day)
reaction.text: If a creature within 5 feet hits the chimera with a melee attack, the attacker is battered by the chimeras tail. The attacker makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet from the chimera and knocked prone.

reaction.name: Winged Charge (1/Day)
reaction.text: If a creature the chimera can see hits it with a ranged attack, the chimera leaps off the ground and moves up to its fly speed towards the attacker. If within range, the chimera then makes a headbutt attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: The chimera can take 2 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Bite
legendary.text: The chimera uses its Bite attack.

legendary.name: Claw
legendary.text: The chimera uses its Claw attack.

monster.name: Chuul - a5e
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The chuul can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Detect Magic
trait.text: The chuul senses a magical aura around any visible creature or object within 120 feet that bears magic.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: If the chuul is grappling a creature it uses its tentacle on that creature. It then makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one Large or smaller target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 15). When carrying a grappled creature the chuul can move at full speed. A pincer that is being used to grapple a creature can be used only to attack that creature.

action.name: Tentacle
action.text: A grappled creature makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it is paralyzed for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the paralysis on a success.

monster.name: Clay Guardian - a5e
monster.immune: acid, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Constructed Nature
trait.text: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage dealt. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A greater restoration spell or similar magic removes the reduction.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: When motionless, the cloaker is indistinguishable from a black cloak or similar cloth or leather article.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
trait.text: The cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks while in bright light.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). If the cloaker has advantage against the target the cloaker attaches to the targets head and the target is blinded and suffocating. Until this grapple ends the cloaker automatically hits the grappled creature with this attack. When the cloaker is dealt damage while grappling it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the grappled target. The cloaker can have only one creature grappled at once.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage and the creature makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it is poisoned until the end of the cloakers next turn.

action.name: Moan
action.text: Each non-aberration creature within 60 feet that can hear its moan makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is frightened until the end of the cloakers next turn. When a creature succeeds on this saving throw it becomes immune to the cloakers moan for 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (1/Day)
action.text: The cloaker magically creates flickering illusions of itself in its space. Attacks on it have disadvantage. This effect ends after 1 minute when the cloaker enters an area of bright light or when it successfully grapples a creature.

reaction.name: Reactive Tail
reaction.text: When hit or missed with a melee attack, the cloaker makes a tail attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Angry Moan
reaction.text: When the cloaker takes damage, it uses Moan.

monster.name: Clockwork Sentinel - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond that range), passive Perception 12

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the sentinel is indistinguishable from normal armor.

trait.name: Clockwork Nature
trait.text: A clockwork doesnt require air, nourishment, or rest, and is immune to disease.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The clockwork is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The sentinel attacks three times.

action.name: Halberd
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Calculated Sweep
action.text: The sentinel makes a melee attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet. On a critical hit the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: The sentinel adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

reaction.name: Overclock (Recharge 5-6)
reaction.text: The sentinel takes the Dash action.

trait.name: Cloud Sight
trait.text: Clouds and fog do not impair the giants vision.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The giants spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light, 3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis, 1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant attacks twice with its glaive.

action.name: Glaive
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 39 (9d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Fog Cloud (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The giant creates a 20-foot-radius heavily obscured sphere of fog centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour). It lasts for 1 hour.

trait.name: Cloud Sight
trait.text: Clouds and fog do not impair the giants vision.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The giants spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light, 3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis, 1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant attacks twice with its glaive.

action.name: Glaive
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 39 (9d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Fog Cloud (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The giant creates a 20-foot-radius heavily obscured sphere of fog centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour). It lasts for 1 hour.

action.name: Arc Lightning (1/Day)
action.text: Up to three creatures within 60 feet that the giant can see make DC 15 Dexterity saving throws taking 42 (12d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Blinking Blades (1/Day)
action.text: The giant magically teleports multiple times within a few seconds. The giant may make one glaive attack against each creature of its choice within 30 feet up to a maximum of 6 attacks.

action.name: Reverse Gravity (1/Day)
action.text: Each creature of the giants choice within 30 feet is magically hurled 60 feet in the air. If a creature hits an obstacle it takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. The creatures then fall taking falling damage as normal.

action.name: Silver Tongue (1/Day)
action.text: One creature that can hear the giant within 30 feet makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is magically charmed by the giant for 1 hour. This effect ends if the giant or its allies harm the creature.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being petrified. On a failure the target is restrained as it begins to turn to stone. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect. If still restrained the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Frenzy (1/Day)
reaction.text: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit range 10/30 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Commoners are humanoids who are not trained in combat
action.text: Typical commoners include farmers herders artisans servants and scholars.

trait.name: Area Vulnerability
trait.text: The mob takes double damage from any effect that targets an area.

trait.name: Mob Dispersal
trait.text: When the mob is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 5 (1d6 + 2) commoners with 2 hit points.

trait.name: Mob
trait.text: The mob is composed of 10 or more commoners. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects. The mob can move through any opening large enough for one Medium creature.

action.name: Clubs
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. up to two targets. Hit: 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage or half damage if the mob is bloodied.

action.name: Stones
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit range 10/30 ft. up to two targets. Hit: 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage or half damage if the mob is bloodied.

action.name: When riled up by strident voices, angry people may coalesce into a group that acts like a single organism
action.text: A mob might commit acts of violence its individual members would otherwise shun.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the snake can't constrict a different target.

monster.name: Copper Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17

trait.name: Flow Within the Mountain
trait.text: The dragon has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in mountainous regions.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Acid Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot-long 5-foot wide-line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw taking 13 (3d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Slowing Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Aquatic
trait.text: The coralfish can only breathe underwater.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being petrified. On a failure the target is restrained as it begins to turn to a brightly colored statue. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect. If still restrained the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Frenzy (1/Day)
reaction.text: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The unicorn attacks once with its hooves and once with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horn
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage. If the target is a creature and the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Trample
action.text: The unicorn attacks a prone creature with its hooves.

action.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
action.text: A 15-foot radius area of magical darkness emanates from the unicorn spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light can't penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the unicorn takes damage. The aura doesnt hinder the unicorns sight.

action.name: Grant Boon (3/Day)
action.text: The unicorn touches a willing creature including itself with its horn and grants one of the following boons:

action.name: Healing: The creature magically regains 21 (6d6) hit points
action.text: It is cured of all diseases and poisons affecting it are neutralized.

action.name: Luck: During the next 24 hours, the creature can roll a d12 and add the result to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw after seeing the result
Protection: A glowing mote of light orbits the creatures head
action.text: The mote lasts 24 hours. When the creature fails a saving throw it can use its reaction to expend the mote and succeed on the saving throw.

action.name: Resolution: The creature is immune to being charmed or frightened for 24 hours

trait.name: Alchemy Schooling
trait.text: The alchemist gains their proficiency bonus and an expertise die (+1d6) on checks made with alchemists supplies.

trait.name: Crafting
trait.text: So long as the alchemist has the required components and equipment, they are able to craft potions of up to legendary rarity and other magic items of up to very rare rarity.

trait.name: Potion Crafter
trait.text: The alchemist has the following potions on hand:

trait.name: Potion of climbing: For 1 hour, the drinker gains a climb speed equal to its Speed and has advantage on Athletics checks made to climb
Potion of greater healing (3): Restores 14 (4d4 + 4) hit points
Potion of superior healing: Restores 28 (8d4 + 8) hit points
Potion of water breathing: For 1 hour, the drinker can breathe underwater

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The alchemist attacks twice with their dagger.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Bomb (3/Day)
action.text: The alchemist lobs a bomb at a point they can see within 80 feet. Upon impact the bomb explodes in a 10-foot radius. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Desperate Drink (1/Day
reaction.text: When the alchemist is dealt damage, they drink a potion.

reaction.name: A typical cosmopolitan alchemist employs a trusted underling
Alter Bomb
reaction.text: The alchemist quickly swaps reagents to change the damage dealt by their next bomb to acid, cold, lightning, poison, or thunder.

reaction.name: Potion
reaction.text: The alchemist drinks or administers a potion.

monster.name: Couatl - a5e
monster.resist: psychic, radiant; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The couatls spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, 3/day each: create food and water, detect thoughts, lesser restoration, 1/day each: dream, greater restoration, scrying

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained the couatl can't constrict other targets and the couatl has advantage on attacks against the target.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it is poisoned for 24 hours. The target is unconscious until the poisoned condition ends or a creature uses an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Heal (1/Day)
action.text: The couatl touches a creature magically healing 20 hit points of damage and ending the poisoned condition on that creature.

action.name: Shapeshift
action.text: The couatl magically changes its form to resemble that of a humanoid or beast or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. If its form is humanoid it is equipped with clothing and a weapon. While shapeshifted its statistics are the same except that it can't use Constrict and Shielding Wing and it may gain a swim speed of 60 or lose its fly speed if appropriate to its new form. If its a beast it can use its bite attack. If its a humanoid it may make a weapon attack which functions identically to its bite attack.

reaction.name: Shielding Wing
reaction.text: When the couatl or a creature within 5 feet is attacked, the couatl can interpose a wing and impose disadvantage on the attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, invisibility, minor illusion, 1/day: geas

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hag attacks twice with its claws and then uses Hex if not in beast form.

action.name: Beast Form
action.text: The hag magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into its true form. While in beast form it retains its game statistics can't cast spells can't use Hex and can't speak. The hags Speed increases by 10 feet and when appropriate to its beast form it gains a climb fly or swim speed of 40 feet. Any equipment the hag is wearing or wielding merges into its new form.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Hex (Gaze)
action.text: A creature within 60 feet that is not already under a hags hex makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under an obligation to the hag automatically fails this saving throw. On a failed saving throw the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll 1d4:
Charm Hex. The target is charmed by the hag.
Fear Hex. The target is frightened of the hag.
Ill Fortune Hex. The hag magically divines the targets activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft or downtime activity the hag can cause the activity to fail.
Sleep Hex. The target falls unconscious. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks uses Hex or casts a spell.

trait.name: Curse
trait.text: A creature touched by the hags claws is magically cursed for 30 days. While under this curse, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against the hag.

trait.name: Evil
trait.text: The hag radiates an Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage and the target is subject to the hags Curse trait.

action.name: Sleep Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: The target falls asleep for 4 hours or until it takes damage or is shaken awake. Once the hag successfully hits a target it can't make this attack again until it finishes a long rest.

action.name: Shapeshift
action.text: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains its claws in any form. It has no true form and remains in its current form when it dies.

action.name: Planar Travel (3/Day)
action.text: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa. Alternatively the hag is magically transported to the Material Plane Hell or the Abyss arriving within 10 miles of its desired destination.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
action.text: While on the Ethereal Plane the hag magically touches a sleeping creature that is under the night hags Curse and is not protected by a magic circle or protection from evil and good spell or similar magic. As long as the touch persists the target has terrible nightmares. If the nightmares last for 1 hour the target gains no benefit from the rest and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10) until the curse ends. If this effect reduces the targets hit points maximum to 0 the target dies and the hag captures its soul. The reduction to the targets hit point maximum lasts until removed by greater restoration or similar magic.

reaction.name: Steal Magic (3/Day)
reaction.text: When a creature the hag can see within 60 feet casts a spell using a 3rd-level or lower spell slot, the hag attempts to steal its power. The caster makes a DC 14 saving throw using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell fails, and the hag gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points per level of the spell slot used.

reaction.name: Fragmentary Dream
reaction.text: The hag creates a terrifying illusion visible only to one creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. It takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and becomes frightened until the end of its turn on a failure, or takes half damage on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Curse
trait.text: A creature that makes a bargain with the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hags scrying and geas spells, and the hag can cast control weather centered on the creature.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, 1/day: control weather, geas, scrying

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Death Glare (Gaze)
action.text: One frightened creature within 30 feet makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw the creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success the creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hag attacks twice with its claws.

action.name: Lightning Blast (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: An 80-foot-long 5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the hags extended claw. Each creature in the area makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw taking 21 (6d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Curse
trait.text: A creature that accepts a gift from the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hags charm person, geas, and scrying spells, and the hag can cast control weather centered on the creature.

trait.name: Icy Travel
trait.text: The hag is not hindered by cold weather, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the hag and her allies leave no trace when walking on snow or ice.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: charm person, dancing lights, invisibility, minor illusion, passwall (ice only), 1/day: control weather (extreme cold), geas, scrying, 1/day each: cone of cold, wall of ice

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hag attacks with its claws and uses Ice Bolt.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Ice Bolt
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit range 60 ft. one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) cold damage and the target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure the creature is restrained as it begins to turn to ice. At the end of the creatures next turn the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature is petrified into ice. This petrification can be removed with greater restoration or similar magic.

action.name: Shapeshift
action.text: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains a streak of white hair in any form. It returns to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks or casts a spell.

action.name: Cone of Cold (5th-Level; V, S)
action.text: Frost blasts from the hag in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Wall of Ice (6th-level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The hag magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet. The wall is flat 1 foot thick and can be up to 50 feet long and 20 feet high. The wall lasts for 10 minutes. Each 10-foot section has AC 12 30 hit points vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to cold poison and psychic damage. Destroying a 10-foot section of wall leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the section occupied. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn makes a Constitution saving throw taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (hags choice)
action.text: The creature then makes a Dexterity saving throw taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Ice Shield
reaction.text: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 (4d6) cold damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points the target takes no damage from this attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The boss attacks three times with their shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Mark for Death
action.text: The boss targets a creature within 30 feet that can see or hear them. For 1 minute or until the boss threatens a different target the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage whenever the boss hits it with a weapon attack.

reaction.name: Command Bodyguard
reaction.text: When the boss would be hit by an attack, they command an ally within 5 feet to use its reaction to switch places with the boss. The ally is hit by the attack instead of the boss.

reaction.name: Offhand Dagger
reaction.text: When missed by an attack, the boss makes a dagger attack.

reaction.name: A crime boss has risen to the top of a criminal gang or guild
reaction.text: Theyre tough in a fight but too smart to do their own dirty work unless absolutely necessary.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the crocodile can't bite a different target.

monster.name: Crusher - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond that range), passive Perception 12

trait.name: Clockwork Nature
trait.text: A clockwork doesnt require air, nourishment, or rest, and is immune to disease.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The clockwork is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Crush
action.text: The crusher moves up to its Speed in a straight line. While doing so it can attempt to enter Large or smaller creatures spaces. Whenever the crusher attempts to enter a creatures space the creature makes a DC 17 Dexterity or Strength saving throw (the creatures choice). If the creature succeeds at a Strength saving throw the crushers movement ends for the turn. If the creature succeeds at a Dexterity saving throw the creature may use its reaction if available to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The first time on the crushers turn that it enters a creatures space the creature is knocked prone and takes 50 (10d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. A creature is prone while in the crushers space.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the crusher moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the attack deals an extra 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fanatic
trait.text: The cult fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The cult fanatic is a 4th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12 +4 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): light sacred flame thaumaturgy 1st-level (4 slots): ceremony command detect evil and good inflict wounds 2nd-level (3 slots): blindness/deafness hold person

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 4 (1d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

action.name: Command (1st-Level; V)
action.text: One non-undead creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet that can hear and understand them makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target uses its next turn to grovel (falling prone and then ending its turn).

action.name: Inflict Wounds (1st-Level; V, S)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

action.name: Blindness/Deafness (2nd-Level; V)
action.text: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the creature is blinded or deafened (cult fanatics choice) for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Hold Person (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
action.text: One humanoid the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Cult fanatics are leaders who recruit for and command forbidden cults
action.text: They have either been granted real spellcasting abilities by the dark forces they serve or they have twisted their pre-existing magical abilities to the service of their cause.

trait.name: Fanatic
trait.text: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened by creatures not in their cult.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Cultists worship forbidden gods, devils, demons, and other sinister beings
action.text: Many cultists work to summon the object of their devotion to the world so it might grant them power and destroy their enemies.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: The cutthroat deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the cutthroats target is within 5 feet of an ally of the cutthroat while the cutthroat doesnt have disadvantage on the attack.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Panicked Rage
trait.text: While a cyclops is frightened and the source of its fear is in sight, it makes attack rolls with advantage instead of disadvantage.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
trait.text: The cyclops makes all ranged attacks with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception) one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Big Windup
reaction.text: When a creature hits the cyclops with a melee attack, the cyclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The cyclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Thick Skulled (1/Day)
reaction.text: The cyclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

trait.name: Panicked Rage
trait.text: While a cyclops is frightened and the source of its fear is in sight, it makes attack rolls with advantage instead of disadvantage.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
trait.text: The cyclops makes all ranged attacks with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception) one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Big Windup
reaction.text: When a creature hits the cyclops with a melee attack, the cyclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The cyclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Thick Skulled (1/Day)
reaction.text: The cyclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The darkmantle can't use blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the darkmantle is indistinguishable from rock.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The darkmantle uses Darkness Aura and makes a crush attack.

action.name: Darkness Aura
action.text: A 15-foot radius area of magical darkness emanates from the darkmantle spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light can't penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the darkmantle takes damage.

action.name: Crush
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). If the darkmantle made the attack with advantage it attaches to the targets head and the target is blinded and can't breathe. While grappling the darkmantle can only attack the grappled creature but has advantage on its attack roll. The darkmantles speed becomes 0 and it moves with its target.

monster.name: Dead Mans Fingers - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone, restrained, stunned
monster.senses: blindsight 90 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

trait.name: Ethereal and Material
trait.text: The dead mans fingers lives simultaneously on the Ethereal and Material Planes. Its senses extend into both planes, and it can touch and be touched by creatures on both planes.

trait.name: Ethereal Shift
trait.text: When a creature on the Material Plane touches the dead mans fingers or hits it with a melee attack, the creature is magically transported to the Ethereal Plane. The creature can see and hear into both the Ethereal and Material Plane but is unaffected by creatures and objects on the Material Plane. It can be seen as a ghostly form by creatures on the Material Plane. It can move in any direction, with each foot of movement up or down costing 2 feet of movement.

trait.name: If the creature is still on the Ethereal Plane when the dead mans fingers dies, the creature returns to the Material Plane
trait.text: If this would cause a creature to appear in a space occupied by a solid object or creature, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

trait.name: Flammable
trait.text: After taking fire damage, the dead mans fingers catches fire and takes ongoing 11 (2d10) fire damage if it isnt already suffering ongoing fire damage. It can spend an action or bonus action to extinguish this fire.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dead mans fingers makes two tendril attacks.

action.name: Tendril (Ethereal or Material Plane)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 20 ft. one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. A target on the Material Plane is subject to the Ethereal Shift trait.

action.name: Ethereal Spores (While Bloodied, Ethereal Plane Only)
action.text: Each creature within 30 feet makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw taking 31 (9d6) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies. If a creature killed by this attack remains on the Ethereal Plane for 24 hours its corpse disintegrates and a new dead mans fingers sprouts from its place.

trait.name: Two Heads
trait.text: The death dog has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws made to resist being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The death dog attacks twice with its bite.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it becomes infected with a disease. Until this disease is cured the target is poisoned. While diseased the target makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw every 24 hours reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure and ending the disease on a success. This hit point maximum reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Deep Dwarf Resistance
trait.text: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against illusions and to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

trait.name: Deep Dwarf Magic
trait.text: The deep dwarf can innately cast enlarge/reduce (self only, enlarge only) and invisibility (self only) once per long rest without using material components, using Intelligence for their spellcasting ability.

action.name: War Pick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated plus 2 (1d4) damage when Enlarged.

action.name: Enlarge (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The soldier and their equipment grow to Large size for 1 minute. They have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws and their attacks deal an extra 2 (1d4) damage (included in their War Pick attack).

action.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The soldier is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the soldier attacks or casts a spell.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 100/400 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The scout has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Camouflage
trait.text: The scout has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Deep Gnome Resistance
trait.text: The scout has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Deep Gnome Magic
trait.text: The deep gnome can innately cast blindness/deafness (blindness only), disguise self, and nondetection once per long rest without using material components, using Intelligence for their spellcasting ability.

action.name: War Pick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Blindness (2nd-Level; V)
action.text: A creature within 30 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Far underground, deep gnomes use stealth to survive amidst warlike deep dwarves and imperious shadow elves
action.text: Deep gnome scouts hunt and forage search for gems and set ambushes for enemies who approach their settlements.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The deer has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Headbutt
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Demilich - a5e
monster.immune: necrotic, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but doesnt speak

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.text: If the demilich makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
trait.text: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of the five tiny warding gems set on its forehead or teeth shatters.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: A demilich doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Devour Soul
action.text: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet forcing it to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a success or if all the large soul gems on the demilichs skull are occupied the creature takes 40 necrotic damage and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilichs skull the demilich regains 40 hit points and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilichs skull visible as a tiny creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped a creature can't be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.

action.name: A demilich begins combat with one or two empty soul gems

legendary.name: The demilich can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The demilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cranial Transposition
legendary.text: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a nonmagical, unattended skull within 30 teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a nonmagical skull, and the dust composing the demilichs wraithlike body doesnt reform around it.

legendary.name: Dust Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The dust of the demilichs body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Ringing Laugh (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Telekinesis
legendary.text: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the targets movement, both take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

monster.name: Demilich Mastermind - a5e
monster.immune: necrotic, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but doesnt speak

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.text: If the demilich makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
trait.text: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of the five tiny warding gems set on its forehead or teeth shatters.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: A demilich doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.text: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet forcing it to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a success or if all the large soul gems on the demilichs skull are occupied the creature takes 40 necrotic damage and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilichs skull the demilich regains 40 hit points and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilichs skull visible as a tiny creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped a creature can't be restored to life by any means.
