A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.

action.name: A demilich mastermind begins combat with up to four empty soul gems

legendary.name: The demilich can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The demilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cranial Transposition
legendary.text: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a nonmagical, unattended skull within 30 teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a nonmagical skull, and the dust composing the demilichs wraithlike body doesnt reform around it.

legendary.name: Dust Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The dust of the demilichs body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Ringing Laugh (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Telekinesis
legendary.text: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the targets movement, both take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Aligned
trait.text: An angel radiates a Lawful aura. Most angels also radiate a Good aura, and a few radiate Evil.

trait.name: Celestial Dissolution
trait.text: When an angel dies, its body and equipment dissolve into motes of light.

trait.name: Detect Alignment
trait.text: An angel knows the alignment, if any, of each creature within 30 feet that it can see.

trait.name: Immortal Nature
trait.text: An angel doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The deva makes two attacks.

action.name: Celestial Hammer (Deva Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage. On a hit the target can't make opportunity attacks against the deva until the beginning of the targets next turn.

action.name: Divine Blast
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit range 60 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Energy (1/Day)
action.text: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any blindness curse deafness disease or poison on the target. Alternatively the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

action.name: Change Form
action.text: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics including speech and telepathy except that it has the size movement modes and traits of its new form.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The diplodocus makes a stomp attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

action.name: Stomp
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it is pushed 10 feet away from the diplodocus and knocked prone.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The centipede can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target takes 10 (3d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. The target is paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The tyrannosaurus makes a bite attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends the tyrannosaurus can't bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The wolf has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolfs allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The rat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The giant rat has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the rats allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage. Giant rats who dwell in sewers and filth can carry debilitating disease. A creature bitten by a diseased giant rat makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or it becomes infected with sewer plague.

monster.name: Divi - a5e
monster.senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 16

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: The divi can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The divis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, stone shape, 3/day each: creation, move earth, passwall, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (earth elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The divi makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Crushing Hand
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Stone Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quake (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Amid deafening rumbling the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

monster.name: Divi Noble - a5e
monster.senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 16

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: The divi can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The divis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, stone shape, 3/day each: creation, move earth, passwall, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (earth elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The divi makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Crushing Hand
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Stone Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quake (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Amid deafening rumbling the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The djinnis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, wind wall, 3/day each: creation, major image, tongues, wind walk, 1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), control weather, create food and water (10 supply), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Air only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Blast
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit range 90 ft. one target. Hit: 35 (10d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Scimitar Sweep (1/Day, Giant Form Only)
action.text: The djinn makes a scimitar attack against each creature of its choice within its reach.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The djinnis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, wind wall, 3/day each: creation, major image, tongues, wind walk, 1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), control weather, create food and water (10 supply), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Air only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Blast
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit range 90 ft. one target. Hit: 35 (10d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Scimitar Sweep (1/Day, Giant Form Only)
action.text: The djinn makes a scimitar attack against each creature of its choice within its reach.

action.name: Precise Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is surprised it takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fanatic
trait.text: The cult fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Immunity
trait.text: A dragon cultist is immune to one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The cult fanatic is a 4th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12 +4 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): light sacred flame thaumaturgy 1st-level (4 slots): ceremony command detect evil and good inflict wounds 2nd-level (3 slots): blindness/deafness hold person

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 4 (1d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

action.name: Command (1st-Level; V)
action.text: One non-undead creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet that can hear and understand them makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target uses its next turn to grovel (falling prone and then ending its turn).

action.name: Inflict Wounds (1st-Level; V, S)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

action.name: Blindness/Deafness (2nd-Level; V)
action.text: One creature the cult fanatic can see within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the creature is blinded or deafened (cult fanatics choice) for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Hold Person (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
action.text: One humanoid the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Some humanoids worship and serve a dragon
action.text: Dragonborn and kobolds are most likely to do so but any humanoid can be compelled into a dragons service.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragon turtles spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: 3/day each: control weather, water breathing, zone of truth

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 52 (7d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends the dragon turtle can't bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 46 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals double damage against objects vehicles and constructs.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 46 (6d12 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 21 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 20 Constitution saving throw taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Storm (1/Day)
action.text: Hundreds of arcs of lightning crackle from the dragon turtle. Each creature within 90 feet makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw taking 35 (10d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Retract
reaction.text: When the dragon turtle takes 50 damage or more from a single attack or spell, it retracts its head and limbs into its shell. It immediately regains 20 hit points. While retracted, it is blinded; its Speed is 0; it can't take reactions; it has advantage on saving throws; attacks against it have disadvantage; and it has resistance to all damage. The dragon turtle stays retracted until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Tail
reaction.text: When the dragon turtle is hit by an opportunity attack, it makes a tail attack.

reaction.name: Claws
reaction.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

trait.name: Draconic Resistance
trait.text: The warrior is resistant to one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

trait.name: Draconic Smite
trait.text: The warriors weapon attacks deal an additional (1d6) damage of one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Dragonbound warriors serve a dragon by choice or compulsion
action.text: A dragonbound warrior typically guards their masters lair or patrols the surrounding area. Most dragonbound warriors are dragonborn or kobolds but anyone can fall sway to a dragons majesty.

monster.name: Drainpipe Gargoyle - a5e
monster.resist: piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: Gargoyles dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gargoyle attacks with its bite and its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage or 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage if the gargoyle started its turn at least 20 feet above the target.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The gargoyle spits a steam of water 5 feet wide and 30 feet long. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw taking 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and being pushed up to 15 feet from the gargoyle on a failure. On a success a creature takes half damage.

monster.name: Dread Knight - a5e
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: A dread knight doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unholy Aura
trait.text: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knights choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

action.name: Cursed Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and the targets hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Fire Blast (1/Day)
action.text: A fiery mote streaks from the dread knights finger to a point within 120 feet and blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere of black fire which spreads around corners. Each creature within the area makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw or half damage on a success. This damage ignores fire resistance and treats immunity to fire damage as fire resistance.

action.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
action.text: The dread knight magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat 1 foot thick and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12 30 hit points vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to cold necrotic poison and psychic damage.

action.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creatures choice)
action.text: The creature then makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 49 (14d6) cold damage on a successful save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Soul Wrack (1/Day)
action.text: A creature within 60 feet makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw taking 70 (20d6) necrotic damage and falling prone on a failed save or taking half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiendish Steed (1/Day)
action.text: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knights commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

monster.name: Dread Knight Champion - a5e
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: A dread knight doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unholy Aura
trait.text: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knights choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Legion
trait.text: The dread knights sword is a +3 greatsword that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls when it attacks with its cursed greatsword. A humanoid killed by damage from this sword rises the next dusk as a zombie. While attuned to the sword, the dread knight can use a bonus action to command zombies created in this way.

action.name: Cursed Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and the targets hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Fire Blast (1/Day)
action.text: A fiery mote streaks from the dread knights finger to a point within 120 feet and blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere of black fire which spreads around corners. Each creature within the area makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw or half damage on a success. This damage ignores fire resistance and treats immunity to fire damage as fire resistance.

action.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
action.text: The dread knight magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat 1 foot thick and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12 30 hit points vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to cold necrotic poison and psychic damage.

action.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creatures choice)
action.text: The creature then makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 49 (14d6) cold damage on a successful save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Soul Wrack (1/Day)
action.text: A creature within 60 feet makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw taking 70 (20d6) necrotic damage and falling prone on a failed save or taking half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiendish Steed (1/Day)
action.text: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knights commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The troll has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesnt function on its next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesnt regenerate.

trait.name: Severed Limbs
trait.text: If the troll is dealt a critical hit with a slashing weapon, one of its extremities is severed. The extremity has AC 15, 10 hit points, a Speed of 10, and the trolls Regeneration trait. The troll controls the severed extremity and perceives through it with the appropriate senses (for instance, it sees through the eyes of its severed head). As a bonus action, the troll can reattach the extremity. While the troll is missing the extremity, its maximum hit points are reduced by 10. Roll d6 to determine the severed extremity:

trait.name: 1-4: Arm
trait.text: If the troll has an arm, it loses an arm. It loses one of its claw attacks, and the severed arm can make a claw attack.

trait.name: 5-6: Head
trait.text: If the troll has a head, it loses its head. It loses its bite attack, and the severed head can make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The troll makes two bite attacks and three claw attacks.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The dretch radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Energy-Sucking Aura
trait.text: A non-demon creature that takes an action or bonus action while within 10 feet of a dretch can't take another action, bonus action, or reaction until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The drider can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The drider ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The drider makes a claws attack and then either a bite or longsword attack. Alternatively it makes two longbow attacks.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). While grappling a target the drider can't attack a different target with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one grappled creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

action.name: Longsword (wielded two-handed)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit range 120/600 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The bear has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Stealthy
trait.text: The drop bear has advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.

trait.name: Drop
trait.text: The drop bear takes no damage from falling 40 feet or fewer and deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits with an attack after falling at least 20 feet. A creature that takes this extra damage is knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d4+5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the bear can't attack a different target with its claws.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The druid is a 4th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12 +4 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following druid spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft produce flame shillelagh 1st-level (4 slots): entangle longstrider speak with animals thunderwave 2nd-level (3 slots): animal messenger barkskin

action.name: Shillelagh (True Form Only)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) magical bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite (Medium or Large Beast Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Beast Form
action.text: The druid magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into their true form. While in beast form they retain their game statistics can't cast spells and can't speak. The druids Speed increases by 10 feet and when appropriate to their beast form they gain climb fly or swim speeds of 40 feet. Any equipment the druid is wearing or wielding merges into their new form.

action.name: Produce Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit range 30 ft one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) fire damage.

action.name: Entangle (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: Vines erupt in a 20-foot square centered on a spot on the ground within 120 feet. The area is difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature in the area when the spell is cast makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is restrained by vines. A creature restrained in this way can use its action to make a Strength check (DC 12) freeing itself on a success.

action.name: Thunderwave (1st-Level; V, S)
action.text: Thunder rolls from the druid in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet from the druid. On a success a creature takes half damage and is not pushed.

action.name: Some druids live in the wilderness with only the beasts and trees for companions
action.text: Others serve as spiritual leaders for nomads or farmers healing the sick and praying for fortunate weather.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Nature
trait.text: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants.

trait.name: Tree Stride
trait.text: Once per turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of movement to enter a living tree and emerge from another living tree within 60 feet. Both trees must be at least Large.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Entangling Plants
action.text: Plants magically erupt from the ground in a 20-foot radius around a point up to 120 feet from the dryad. Each creature of the dryads choice in the area makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure a creature is restrained for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check freeing itself or a creature within 5 feet on a success. Additionally the area is difficult terrain for 1 minute.

action.name: Fey Charm (3/Day)
action.text: A humanoid or beast within 30 feet makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is magically charmed. While charmed in this way the target regards the dryad as a trusted ally and is disposed to interpret the dryads requests and actions favorably. The creature can repeat this saving throw if the dryad or the dryads allies harm it ending the effect on a success. Otherwise the effect lasts 24 hours. If the creature succeeds on a saving throw against Fey Charm or the effect ends for it it is immune to Fey Charm for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The warrior attacks twice.

action.name: Rapier
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
reaction.text: When the duelist is missed by a melee attack by an attacker they can see within 5 feet, the duelist makes a rapier attack against the attacker with advantage.

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the mephit dies, it explodes into dust. Each creature within 5 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is blinded until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the mephit is indistinguishable from a pile of dirt.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: A mephit doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Blinding Breath (1/Day)
action.text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of dust. Each creature in the area makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the creature is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Sleep Sand (1/Day)
action.text: The closest creature within 60 feet with 20 hit points or fewer falls asleep for 1 minute. It awakens early if it takes damage or a creature uses an action to shake it awake. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The eagle has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

monster.name: Earth Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 14

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: The dragon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the dragon remains motionless within its linked area, it is indistinguishable from a natural rocky outcropping.

trait.name: Essence Link
trait.text: The essence dragon is spiritually linked to a specific area or landmark. The dragon gains no benefit from a long rest when more than 1 mile away from its linked area. If the dragon dies, the area it is linked to loses its vital essence until it forms a new essence dragon, which can take centuries. When a creature first enters an area that has lost its vital essence in this way, they gain a level of fatigue and a level of strife. This fatigue and strife can be removed only by completing a long rest outside the area.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Scouring Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon breathes scouring sand and stones in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 10 (3d6) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Earths Embrace
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the elemental can't burrow or use Earths Embrace and its slam attacks are made with advantage against the grappled target.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit range 30/90 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The efreetis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, 3/day each: creation, gaseous form, major image, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (fire elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Fire only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The efreeti makes two brass sword attacks or hurls flame twice. The efreeti can replace one attack with a kick.

action.name: Brass Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Kick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d4 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the efreet.

action.name: Hurl Flame
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit range 120 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) fire damage.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The efreetis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, 3/day each: creation, gaseous form, major image, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (fire elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Fire only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The efreeti makes two brass sword attacks or hurls flame twice. The efreeti can replace one attack with a kick.

action.name: Brass Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Kick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d4 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the efreet.

action.name: Hurl Flame
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit range 120 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) fire damage.

monster.name: Elder Black Pudding - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

trait.name: Amorphous
trait.text: The pudding can pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Body
trait.text: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet takes 9 (2d8) acid damage. A nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the black pudding corrodes after dealing damage, taking a permanent -1 penalty to damage rolls per hit. If this penalty reaches -5, the weapon is destroyed. Wooden or metal nonmagical ammunition is destroyed after dealing damage. Any other metal or organic object that touches it takes 9 (2d8) acid damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The pudding can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the pudding has disadvantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
trait.text: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. Nonmagical armor worn by the target corrodes taking a permanent -1 penalty to its AC protection per hit. If the penalty reduces the armors AC protection to 10 the armor is destroyed.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The pudding makes two pseudopod attacks. The pudding can't use Multiattack after it splits for the first time.

reaction.name: Split
reaction.text: When a Medium or larger pudding with at least 10 hit points is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two puddings that are each one size smaller. Each new pudding has half the originals hit points (rounded down).

monster.name: Elder Vampire - a5e
monster.resist: necrotic; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons
monster.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 17
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it visibly grows older. Its original appearance is restored when it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Misty Recovery
trait.text: When the vampire drops to 0 hit points, instead of falling unconscious, it turns into mist as if it had used the Mist Form legendary action. It can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to vampire form and is paralyzed for 1 hour, at which time it regains 1 hit point. While paralyzed in this way, it can be destroyed by fire damage, radiant damage, damage from a magical weapon, or a wooden stake driven through the heart, but it is otherwise immune to damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and hasnt taken radiant damage since its last turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The vampire can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
trait.text: Vampires most common weaknesses are sunlight and running water. When the vampire ends its turn in contact with one of its weaknesses (such as being bathed in sunlight or running water), it takes 20 radiant damage. While in contact with its weakness, it can't use its Regeneration trait or its Mist Form or Shapechange actions.

trait.name: Resting Place
trait.text: Every vampires lair contains a resting place, usually a coffin or sarcophagus, where the vampire must rest for at least an hour each day to recuperate its powers. This resting place is sprinkled with soil from its mortal homeland. If this soil is scattered or is subjected to a bless, hallow, or similar spell, the vampire is destroyed when reduced to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
trait.text: While bloodied, the vampire can take 3 legendary actions instead of 1.

action.name: Grab (Vampire Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained while grappled in this way.

action.name: Charm
action.text: The vampire targets a creature within 30 feet forcing it to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is charmed by the vampire for 24 hours. While charmed it regards the vampire as a trusted friend and is a willing target for the vampires bite. The target repeats the saving throw each time it takes damage ending the effect on itself on a success. If the targets saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it it is immune to this vampires Charm for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Hissing Scuttle (1/Day)
reaction.text: When the vampire takes radiant damage, it moves up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Warding Charm (1/Day)
reaction.text: When a creature the vampire can see targets it with a melee attack but before the attack is made, the vampire uses Charm on that creature.

reaction.name: Bite
reaction.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target that is grappled, incapacitated, restrained, willing, or unaware of the vampires presence. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. The targets hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage dealt, and the vampire regains this number of hit points. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points by this attack, it dies and rises the following night as a vampire spawn in the vampires thrall. Before the target first rises as a vampire spawn, a bless, gentle repose, or similar spell cast on the body prevents this transformation.

legendary.name: The vampire can take 1 legendary action
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Blood Charm
legendary.text: The vampire uses Charm. A creature makes its initial saving throw with disadvantage if the vampire has hit it with a bite attack within the last 24 hours.

legendary.name: Grab
legendary.text: The vampire makes a grab attack.

legendary.name: Mist Form
legendary.text: The vampire transforms into a mist or back into its true form. As mist, the vampire has a flying speed of 30, can't speak, can't take actions or manipulate objects, is immune to nonmagical damage from weapons, and has advantage on saving throws and Stealth checks. It can pass through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing but can't pass through water. Anything its carrying transforms with it.

legendary.name: Shapechange
legendary.text: The vampire transforms into the shape of a Medium or smaller beast or back into its true form. While transformed, it has the beasts size and movement modes. It can't use reactions or legendary actions, and can't speak. Otherwise, it uses the vampires statistics. Anything its carrying transforms with it.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 19 (3d8+6) piercing damage. If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Stomp
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (3d10+6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the elk moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

monster.name: Emerald Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.languages: Deep Speech, Draconic, Undercommon, telepathy 120 ft.

trait.name: Far Thoughts
trait.text: The dragon is aware of any creature that uses a psionic ability or communicates telepathically within 100 miles of it. As an action, the dragon can psionically observe a creature, object, or location it is familiar with within 100 miles. While observing a subject in this way, the dragon can see, hear, and communicate telepathically, but it is blind and deaf in regard to its physical senses and does not require food or water. The dragon can psionically observe a subject indefinitely and can end this effect and return to its own senses as an action.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Maddening Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon screams stripping flesh from bone in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw taking 16 (3d10) thunder damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Divine Grace
trait.text: If the empyrean makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure. Furthermore, while wearing medium armor, the empyrean adds its full Dexterity bonus to its Armor Class (already included).

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The empyreans innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: charm person, command, telekinesis, 3/day: flame strike, hold monster, lightning bolt, 1/day: commune, greater restoration, heroes feast, plane shift (self only, can't travel to or from the Material Plane)

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 38 (8d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage and the target makes a DC 25 Strength saving throw. On a failure the target is pushed up to 30 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level; V, S)
action.text: A bolt of lightning 5 feet wide and 100 feet long arcs from the empyrean. Each creature in the area makes a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V, S)
action.text: A column of divine flame fills a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Hold Monster (5th-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: One creature the empyrean can see within 60 feet makes a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: The empyrean can take 1 legendary action
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: The empyrean makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast Spell
legendary.text: The empyrean casts a spell. The empyrean can't use this option if it has cast a spell since the start of its last turn.

legendary.name: Fly
legendary.text: The empyrean flies up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Shout (Recharge 5-6)
legendary.text: Each creature within 120 feet that can hear the empyrean makes a DC 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 24 (7d6) thunder damage and is stunned until the end of the empyreans next turn. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

monster.name: Erinyes - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The erinyes radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The erinyes makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage and the target makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it is poisoned for 24 hours or until the poison is removed by lesser restoration or similar magic.

action.name: Lasso
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: The target is entangled by the lasso. While entangled it can't move more than 15 feet away from the erinyes. The entanglement ends if the erinyes releases the lasso or becomes incapacitated or if the lasso is destroyed. The lasso is an object with AC 12 and 20 HP and is immune to piercing poison psychic and thunder damage. The entanglement also ends if the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to succeed on a DC 16 Athletics or Acrobatics check to remove the lasso. The erinyes can't make a lasso attack while a creature is entangled.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: If the erinyes is wielding a longsword and can see its attacker, it adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

trait.name: Speak with Spiders
trait.text: The ettercap can communicate with spiders that can hear it or that are touching the same web.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The ettercap can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Web Sense
trait.text: While touching a web, the ettercap knows the location of other creatures touching that web.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ettercap attacks with its bite and claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Strangle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one Medium or smaller creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends the ettercap automatically hits the target with its strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

monster.name: Ettin - a5e
monster.senses: darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12 (17 with Two Heads)

trait.name: Reactive Heads
trait.text: The ettin can take two reactions each round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Two Heads
trait.text: While both heads are awake, the ettin has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

trait.name: Wakeful
trait.text: When one of the ettins heads is asleep, the other is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ettin makes a battleaxe attack and a club attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the ettin is bloodied the target makes a DC 15 Strength check and is knocked prone on a failure.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit range 30/90 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Axe Whirl (1/Day)
action.text: The ettin makes a battleaxe attack against each creature within 10 feet.

monster.name: Faerie Dragon - a5e
monster.languages: Draconic, Sylvan, telepathy 60 ft. (with other dragons only)

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast spells, requiring no material components. The dragon gains additional spells as it ages. 5 years old, at will: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion, 10 years old, 1/day: suggestion, 30 years old, 1/day: major image, 50 years old, 1/day: hallucinatory terrain

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon breathes an intoxicating gas at a creature within 5 feet. The target makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is confused for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Prismatic Light (3/Day)
action.text: The dragons scales pulse with light. Each creature within 15 feet that can see the dragon makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature is magically blinded until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Beast Form (1/Day, 50+ Years Old Only)
action.text: The dragon targets one creature within 15 feet. The target makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is magically transformed into a harmless Tiny beast such as a mouse or a songbird for 1 minute. While in this form its statistics are unchanged except it can't speak or take actions reactions or

monster.name: Faerie Dragon Familiar - a5e
monster.languages: Draconic, Sylvan, telepathy 60 ft. (with other dragons only)

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast spells, requiring no material components. The dragon gains additional spells as it ages. 5 years old, at will: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion, 10 years old, 1/day: suggestion, 30 years old, 1/day: major image, 50 years old, 1/day: hallucinatory terrain

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon breathes an intoxicating gas at a creature within 5 feet. The target makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is confused for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Prismatic Light (3/Day)
action.text: The dragons scales pulse with light. Each creature within 15 feet that can see the dragon makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature is magically blinded until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Beast Form (1/Day, 50+ Years Old Only)
action.text: The dragon targets one creature within 15 feet. The target makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is magically transformed into a harmless Tiny beast such as a mouse or a songbird for 1 minute. While in this form its statistics are unchanged except it can't speak or take actions reactions or

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The troll has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The troll has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesnt function on its next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesnt regenerate.

trait.name: Severed Limbs
trait.text: If the troll is dealt a critical hit with a slashing weapon, one of its extremities is severed. The extremity has AC 15, 10 hit points, a Speed of 10, and the trolls Regeneration trait. The troll controls the severed extremity and perceives through it with the appropriate senses (for instance, it sees through the eyes of its severed head). As a bonus action, the troll can reattach the extremity. While the troll is missing the extremity, its maximum hit points are reduced by 10. Roll d6 to determine the severed extremity:

trait.name: 1-4: Arm
trait.text: If the troll has an arm, it loses an arm. It loses one of its claw attacks, and the severed arm can make a claw attack.

trait.name: 5-6: Head
trait.text: If the troll has a head, it loses its head. It loses its bite attack, and the severed head can make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The troll attacks with its bite and twice with its claw. When the troll uses Multiattack it can use Charming Murmur in place of its bite.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Charming Murmur
action.text: One creature within 60 feet that can hear the troll makes a DC 12 Charisma saving throw. On a failure it is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed its Speed is 0. The creature repeats the saving throw whenever it takes damage.

trait.name: Faerie Form
trait.text: The noble can magically change its size between Large, Medium, and Tiny as an action. While Tiny, the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by the nobles attacks is halved. Additionally, it has disadvantage on Strength checks and advantage on Dexterity checks. While Large, the noble has advantage on Strength checks. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged.

trait.name: Faerie Light
trait.text: As a bonus action, the noble can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The nobles spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: animal messenger, detect evil and good, detect magic, disguise self, 3/day each: charm person, scrying, zone of truth, 1/day each: dream, geas, heroes feast, magic circle, polymorph (self only)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The noble makes two glittering scimitar attacks.

action.name: Glittering Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold fire lightning or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Gleaming Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. This attack ignores half or three-quarters cover. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) cold fire lightning or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Evil Eye (Gaze)
action.text: The noble targets one creature not under the effect of a faeries Evil Eye within 60 feet. The target makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw the noble chooses one of the following effects to magically impose on the target. Each effect lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: The target falls asleep
action.text: This effect ends if the target takes damage or another creature uses an action to rouse it.

action.name: The target is frightened
action.text: This effect ends if the target is ever 60 feet or more from the noble.

action.name: The target is poisoned
action.text: It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Riposte
reaction.text: When the noble is hit by a melee attack made by a creature it can see, it makes a glittering scimitar attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Vengeful Eye
reaction.text: When the noble is hit by a ranged attack or targeted with a spell by a creature within 60 feet, it uses Evil Eye on the attacker if they can see each other.

reaction.name: Faerie Step (Recharge 5-6)
reaction.text: The noble magically teleports up to 60 feet to a space it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Aligned
trait.text: An angel radiates a Lawful aura. Most angels also radiate a Good aura, and a few radiate Evil.

trait.name: Celestial Dissolution
trait.text: When an angel dies, its body and equipment dissolve into motes of light.

trait.name: Detect Alignment
trait.text: An angel knows the alignment, if any, of each creature within 30 feet that it can see.

trait.name: Immortal Nature
trait.text: An angel doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The deva makes two attacks.

action.name: Celestial Hammer (Deva Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage. On a hit the target can't make opportunity attacks against the deva until the beginning of the targets next turn.

action.name: Divine Blast
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit range 60 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Energy (1/Day)
action.text: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any blindness curse deafness disease or poison on the target. Alternatively the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

action.name: Change Form
action.text: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics including speech and telepathy except that it has the size movement modes and traits of its new form.

action.name: Consume Life Energy (1/Day)
action.text: The angel feasts on the departing life energy of a humanoid within 5 feet. The target must have been slain within the last hour. The angel magically gains temporary hit points equal to half the dead creatures maximum hit points. These hit points last until depleted. Only a spell cast with a 9th-level slot can raise the corpse from the dead.

trait.name: Champion of Truth
trait.text: The planetar automatically detects lies. Additionally, it cannot lie.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The planetars spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: 1/day each: commune, control weather, raise dead

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The planetar attacks twice with its flaming sword.

action.name: Flaming Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) ongoing fire or radiant damage (the planetars choice). A creature can use an action to extinguish this holy flame on itself or a creature within 5 feet.

action.name: Heavenly Bolt
action.text: The planetar fires a lightning bolt in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line makes a Dexterity saving throw taking 56 (16d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Heal (2/Day)
action.text: The planetar touches a creature other than itself magically healing 60 hit points of damage and ending any blindness curse deafness disease or poison on the target.

action.name: Consume Life Energy (1/Day)
action.text: The angel feasts on the departing life energy of a humanoid within 5 feet. The target must have been slain within the last hour. The angel magically gains temporary hit points equal to half the dead creatures maximum hit points. These hit points last until depleted. Only a spell cast with a 9th-level slot can raise the corpse from the dead.

reaction.name: Protective Parry
reaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet would be hit with a melee attack, the planetar applies disadvantage to the attack roll.

reaction.name: Awe-Inspiring Gaze (Gaze)
reaction.text: The planetar targets a creature within 90 feet. The target makes a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened until the end of its next turn. If the target makes its saving throw, it is immune to any angels Awe-Inspiring Gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Champion of Truth
trait.text: The solar automatically detects lies. Additionally, it cannot lie.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The solars spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 25). The solar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: 1/day each: commune, control weather, resurrection

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The solar attacks twice with its holy sword.

action.name: Holy Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) radiant damage.

action.name: Column of Flame
action.text: Flame erupts in a 10-foot-radius 30-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point the solar can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in the area makes a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw taking 21 (6d6) fire damage and 21 (6d6) radiant damage of a failure or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Consume Life Energy (1/Day)
action.text: The angel feasts on the departing life energy of a humanoid within 5 feet. The target must have been slain within the last hour. The angel magically gains temporary hit points equal to half the dead creatures maximum hit points. These hit points last until depleted. Only a spell cast with a 9th-level slot can raise the corpse from the dead.

reaction.name: Forceful Parry (While Bloodied)
reaction.text: When a creature misses the solar with a melee attack, the solars parrying sword sparks with energy. The attacker takes 21 (6d6) lightning damage and makes a DC 24 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and falls prone.

legendary.name: The solar can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The solar regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
legendary.text: The solar magically teleports up to 120 feet to an empty space it can see.

legendary.name: Heal (3/Day)
legendary.text: The solar touches a creature other than itself, magically healing 60 hit points of damage and ending any blindness, curse, deafness, disease, or poison on the target.

legendary.name: Deafening Command (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The solar speaks an echoing command. Each creature of the solars choice within 30 feet that can hear the solar and understands a language makes a DC 24 Charisma saving throw. Each creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes 21 (6d6) thunder damage. Each creature that fails its saving throw immediately takes a certain action, depending on the solars command. This is a magical charm effect.

legendary.name: Abase yourself! The creature falls prone
Approach! The creature must use its reaction
Flee! The creature must use its reaction
Surrender! The creature drops anything it is holding

monster.name: Fell Nightmare - a5e
monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Evil
trait.text: The nightmare radiates an Evil aura.

trait.name: Fiery Hooves
trait.text: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The nightmare leaves charred hoofprints.

trait.name: Fire Resistance
trait.text: The nightmare can grant fire resistance to a rider.

trait.name: Fiery Trail
trait.text: When the nightmare moves along the ground, it can choose to leave behind a trail of fire 10 feet wide and 10 feet tall, which lasts until the beginning of the nightmares next turn. A creature that begins its turn in the fire or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) fire damage. The trail ignites flammable objects.

trait.name: Telepathy
trait.text: The nightmare gains telepathy with a range of 120 feet. It can telepathically communicate with the fiend that trained it over any distance as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. The nightmare can move through the space of a prone creature as long as it does not end its turn there.

action.name: Ethereal Shift (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The nightmare and a rider magically pass from the Ethereal Plane to the Material Plane or vice versa.

trait.name: Faerie Form
trait.text: The knight can magically change its size between Medium and Tiny as an action. While tiny, the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by the knights attacks is halved. Additionally, it has disadvantage on Strength checks and advantage on Dexterity checks. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged.

trait.name: Faerie Light
trait.text: As a bonus action, the knight can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Glittering Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold fire or lightning damage (its choice).

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour even if it regains hit points and it is asleep while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Fey Glamour
action.text: The knight targets one humanoid within 30 feet. The target makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure it is magically charmed by the knight for 1 day. If the knight or one of the knights allies harms the target the target repeats the saving throw ending the effect on itself on a success. If a targets saving throw is successful or if the effect ends for it the creature is immune to this knights Fey Charm for a year and a day.

reaction.name: Natures Shield
reaction.text: When the knight would be hit by an attack while the knight is within 5 feet of a tree or other large plant, the knights AC magically increases by 3 against that attack as the plant interposes branches or vines between the knight and the attacker.

monster.name: Fire Elemental - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Fire Form
trait.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Fiery Aura
trait.text: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the fire elemental takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Weakness
trait.text: The elemental takes 6 (1d12) cold damage if it enters a body of water or starts its turn in a body of water, is splashed with at least 5 gallons of water, or is hit by a water elementals slam attack.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) fire damage and the target suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Wildfire (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: The elemental moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can enter the spaces of hostile creatures but not end this movement there. When a creature shares its space with the elemental for the first time during this movement the creature is subject to the elementals Fiery Aura and the elemental can make a slam attack against that creature.

trait.name: Cold Weakness
trait.text: When the fire giant takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 42 (10d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 19 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Sword Sweep (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: The giant makes a greatsword attack against each creature within 10 feet.

reaction.name: Kick
reaction.text: When hit by a melee attack by a Medium or smaller creature the giant can see within 10 feet, the giant kicks its attacker. The attacker makes a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it takes 14 (3d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 20 feet from the giant, and falls prone.

trait.name: Cold Weakness
trait.text: When the fire giant takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failure it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 42 (10d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 19 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Sword Sweep (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: The giant makes a greatsword attack against each creature within 10 feet.

action.name: Ignite Blades (1/Day)
action.text: The greatswords of each fire giant of the giants choice within 30 feet magically kindle into flame. For the next minute each of their greatsword attacks deal an extra 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Pillar of Flame (1/Day)
action.text: Each creature within a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within 60 feet that the fire giant can see makes a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. Unattended flammable objects are ignited.

reaction.name: Kick
reaction.text: When hit by a melee attack by a Medium or smaller creature the giant can see within 10 feet, the giant kicks its attacker. The attacker makes a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it takes 14 (3d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 20 feet from the giant, and falls prone.

monster.name: Flesh Guardian - a5e
monster.immune: lightning, poison; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
trait.text: When the guardian starts its turn while bloodied, roll a d6. On a 6, the guardian goes berserk. While berserk, the guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If it can't reach a creature, it attacks an object. The guardian stays berserk until it is destroyed or restored to full hit points.

trait.name: If a berserk guardian can see and hear its creator, the creator can use an action to try to calm it by making a DC 15 Persuasion check
trait.text: On a success, the guardian is no longer berserk.

trait.name: Fire Fear
trait.text: When the guardian takes fire damage, it is rattled until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
trait.text: When the guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Constructed Nature
trait.text: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl Object
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: An 80-foot-long 5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the guardians chest. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Flumph - a5e
monster.languages: understands Common and Undercommon but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The flumph can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Flumph Light
trait.text: As a bonus action, the flumph can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow. The flumph can change the color of the light it casts at will.

trait.name: Telepathic Spy
trait.text: The flumph can perceive any telepathic messages sent or received within 60 feet, and can't be surprised by creatures with telepathy. The flumph is also immune to divination and to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, except for the Telepathic Spy feature of another flumph.

trait.name: Tippable
