trait.text: If a flumph is knocked prone, it lands upside down and is incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, flipping itself over and ending the incapacitated condition on a success.

action.name: Tendrils
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
action.text: Each creature in a 15-foot cone makes a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature exudes a horrible stench for 1 hour. While a creature exudes this stench it and any creature within 5 feet of it are poisoned. A creature can remove the stench on itself by bathing during a rest.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The flying lion has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The griffon attacks once with its beak and once with its talons.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage or 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage if the griffon started its turn at least 20 feet above the target and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the griffon can't attack a different target with its talons.

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The snake doesnt provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of a creatures reach.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

monster.name: Flying Sword - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

trait.name: Spell-created
trait.text: The DC for dispel magic to destroy this creature is 19.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the sword is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

monster.name: Fomorian - a5e
monster.immune: psychic; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Eye Vulnerability
trait.text: A creature can target the fomorians eye with an attack. This attack is made with disadvantage. If the attack hits and deals at least 10 damage, creatures affected by the fomorians Charming and Mesmerizing Gaze are freed from those effects.

trait.name: Immortal Nature
trait.text: A titan doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The fomorian attacks twice with its warhammer.

action.name: Warhammer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Forest Ways
trait.text: The illusionist can communicate with Small and Tiny beasts, and can innately cast blur, disguise self, and major image once each per long rest with no material components.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The mage is a 9th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14 +6 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following wizard spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt light mage hand prestidigitation 1st-level (4 slots): detect magic identify mage armor shield 2nd-level (3 slots): alter self misty step 3rd-level (3 slots): hypnotic pattern counterspell fireball 4th-level (3 slots): dimension door greater invisibility 5th-level (1 slot): cone of cold

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit range 120 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage.

action.name: Hypnotic Pattern (3rd-Level; S, M, Concentration)
action.text: A swirling pattern of light appears at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the pattern that can see it makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed the creature is incapacitated and its Speed is 0. The effect ends on a creature if it takes damage or if another creature uses an action to shake it out of its daze.

action.name: Fireball (3rd-Level; V, S, M)
action.text: Fire streaks from the mage to a point within 120 feet and explodes in a 20-foot radius spreading around corners. Each creature in the area makes a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Dimension Door (4th-Level; V)
action.text: The mage teleports to a location within 500 feet. They can bring along one willing Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. If a creature would teleport to an occupied space it takes 14 (4d6) force damage and the spell fails.

action.name: Greater Invisibility (4th-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The mage or a creature they touch is invisible for 1 minute.

action.name: Cone of Cold (5th-Level; V, S, M)
action.text: Frost blasts from the mage in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Counterspell (3rd-Level; S)
reaction.text: When a creature the mage can see within 60 feet casts a spell, the mage attempts to interrupt it. If the creature is casting a 2nd-level spell or lower, the spell fails. If the creature is casting a 3rd-level or higher spell, the mage makes an Intelligence check against a DC of 10 + the spells level. On a success, the spell fails, and the spellcasting creature can use its reaction to try to cast a second spell with the same casting time so long as it uses a spell slot level equal to or less than half the original spell slot. If the mage casts counterspell with a higher spell slot, the interrupted spell fails if its level is less than that of counterspell.

reaction.name: Shield (1st-Level; V
reaction.text: When the mage is hit by an attack or targeted by magic missile, they gain a +5 bonus to AC (including against the triggering attack) and immunity to magic missile. These benefits last until the start of their next turn.

reaction.name: Misty Step (2nd-Level; V)
reaction.text: The mage teleports to an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet. The mage can't cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The scout has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Forest ways
trait.text: The scout can communicate with Small and Tiny beasts, and can innately cast blur, disguise self, and major image once each per long rest with no material components.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Forest gnome scouts patrol the boundaries of their hidden villages, leading trespassers astray and attacking those they can't distract

monster.name: Forgotten God - a5e
monster.resist: poison, radiant; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Aligned
trait.text: The forgotten god radiates a weak alignment aura, most often Lawful and Good, Chaotic and Good, Lawful and Evil, or Chaotic and Evil. Its behavior may not match its alignment.

trait.name: Flawed Spellcasting
trait.text: The gods innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 17).The god can try to cast flame strike or spirit guardians at will with no material component. When the god tries to cast the spell, roll 1d6. On a 1, 2, or 3 on the die, the spell visibly fails and has no effect. The gods action for the turn is not wasted, but it can't be used to cast a spell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the god fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it seems to flicker and shrink, as if it is using up its essence.

trait.name: Divine Nature
trait.text: A forgotten god doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Divine Weapon
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) damage (damage type based on the form of the weapon or implement) plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.
action.attack: |9|1d8 + 5) damage (damage type based on the form of the weapon or implement) plus 3 (1d6

action.name: Stunning Gaze (Gaze)
action.text: The god targets a creature within 60 feet. The target makes a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failure the target takes 10 (3d6) radiant damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a success the target is immune to Stunning Gaze for 24 hours.

action.name: Divine Wrath (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: Each creature of the gods choice within 60 feet makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw taking 28 (8d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Spirit Guardians (3rd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: Spirits of former divine servants surround the god in a 10-foot radius for 10 minutes. The god can choose creatures they can see to be unaffected by the spell. Other creatures treat the area as difficult terrain and when a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there it makes a DC DC 17 Wisdom saving throw taking 10 (3d6) radiant damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V, S)
action.text: A 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high column of divine flame appears centered on a point the god can see within 60 feet. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Jumper
trait.text: The frog can jump up to 10 feet horizontally and 5 feet vertically without a running start.

trait.name: Fire Fear
trait.text: When the giant takes fire damage, it is rattled until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 37 (9d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. In lieu of a rock the giant can throw a grappled Medium or smaller creature up to 40 feet. On a hit the target and the thrown creature both take 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. On a miss only the thrown creature takes the damage. The thrown creature falls prone in an unoccupied space 5 feet from the target.

trait.name: Fire Fear
trait.text: When the giant takes fire damage, it is rattled until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 37 (9d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. In lieu of a rock the giant can throw a grappled Medium or smaller creature up to 40 feet. On a hit the target and the thrown creature both take 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. On a miss only the thrown creature takes the damage. The thrown creature falls prone in an unoccupied space 5 feet from the target.

monster.name: Gargoyle - a5e
monster.resist: piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: Gargoyles dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gargoyle attacks with its bite and its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage or 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage if the gargoyle started its turn at least 20 feet above the target.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Gear Spider - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Clockwork Nature
trait.text: A clockwork doesnt require air, nourishment, or rest, and is immune to disease.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The clockwork is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

action.name: Needle
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Gelatinous Cube - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

trait.name: Engulfing Body
trait.text: A creature that enters the cubes space is subjected to the saving throw and consequences of its Engulf attack.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the cube has disadvantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Transparent
trait.text: While the cube is motionless, creatures unaware of its presence must succeed on a DC 15 Perception check to spot it.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
trait.text: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

action.name: Engulf
action.text: The cube moves up to its Speed. While doing so it can enter Large or smaller creatures spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creatures space the creature makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. If the creature is unaware of the cubes presence it makes its saving throw against Engulf with disadvantage. On a success the creature may use its reaction if available to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the creature doesnt move it is engulfed by the cube.

action.name: A creature engulfed by the cube takes 10 (3d6) acid damage, can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cubes turns
action.text: It can be seen but has total cover. It moves with the cube. The cube can hold as many creatures as fit in its space without squeezing.

action.name: An engulfed creature can escape by using an action to make a DC 13 Strength check
action.text: On a success the creature moves to a space within 5 feet of the cube. A creature within 5 feet can take the same action to free an engulfed creature but takes 10 (3d6) acid damage in the process.

monster.name: Gelatinous Wall - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

trait.name: Engulfing Body
trait.text: A creature that enters the cubes space is subjected to the saving throw and consequences of its Engulf attack.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the cube has disadvantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Transparent
trait.text: While the cube is motionless, creatures unaware of its presence must succeed on a DC 15 Perception check to spot it.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
trait.text: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage plus 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Engulf
action.text: The cube moves up to its Speed. While doing so it can enter Large or smaller creatures spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creatures space the creature makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. If the creature is unaware of the cubes presence it makes its saving throw against Engulf with disadvantage. On a success the creature may use its reaction if available to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the creature doesnt move it is engulfed by the cube.

action.name: A creature engulfed by the cube takes 10 (3d6) acid damage plus 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage plus 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the cubes turns
action.text: It can be seen but has total cover. It moves with the cube. The cube can hold as many creatures as fit in its space without squeezing.

action.name: An engulfed creature can escape by using an action to make a DC 13 Strength check
action.text: On a success the creature moves to a space within 5 feet of the cube. A creature within 5 feet can take the same action to free an engulfed creature but takes 10 (3d6) acid damage plus 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage in the process.

trait.name: Stench
trait.text: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a success, it is immune to any ghasts Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turning Defiance
trait.text: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet make saving throws against being turned with advantage.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: Ghouls and ghasts dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a living creature it makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If the targets saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it it is immune to any Paralyzing Claw for 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one incapacitated creature. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Ghost - a5e
monster.resist: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; damage from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monster.languages: the languages it spoke in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
trait.text: The ghost can see into both the Material and Ethereal Plane.

trait.name: Incorporeal
trait.text: The ghost can move through creatures and objects. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: A ghost doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unquiet Spirit
trait.text: If defeated in combat, the ghost returns in 24 hours. It can be put to rest permanently only by finding and casting remove curse on its remains or by resolving the unfinished business that keeps it from journeying to the afterlife.

action.name: Withering Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage. If the target is frightened it is magically aged 1d4 x 10 years. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell.

action.name: Ethereal Jaunt
action.text: The ghost magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa. If it wishes it can be visible to creatures on one plane while on the other.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
action.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet and on the same plane of existence that can see the ghost makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure a creature is frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creatures saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it it is immune to this ghosts Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
action.text: One humanoid within 5 feet makes a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failure it is possessed by the ghost. The possessed creature is unconscious. The ghost enters the creatures body and takes control of it. The ghost can be targeted only by effects that turn undead and it retains its Intelligence Wisdom and Charisma. It grants its host body immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed creatures statistics and actions instead of its own. It doesnt gain access to the creatures memories but does gain access to proficiencies nonmagical class features and traits and nonmagical actions. It can't use limited-used abilities or class traits that require spending a resource. The possession ends after 24 hours when the body drops to 0 hit points when the ghost ends it as a bonus action or when the ghost is turned or affected by dispel evil and good or a similar effect. Additionally the possessed creature repeats its saving throw whenever it takes damage. When the possession ends the ghost reappears in a space within 5 feet of the body. A creature is immune to this ghosts Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on its saving throw or after the possession ends.

reaction.name: Horrifying Visage
reaction.text: If the ghost takes damage from an attack or spell, it uses Horrifying Visage.

trait.name: Radiant Sensitivity
trait.text: When the ghoul takes radiant damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Perception checks that rely on sight until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: Ghouls and ghasts dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a living creature other than an elf it makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If the targets saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it it is immune to any Paralyzing Claw for 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one incapacitated creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Giant Air Elemental - a5e
monster.resist: lightning, thunder; damage from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Air Form
trait.text: The elemental can enter and end its turn in other creatures spaces and pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (6d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The elemental takes the form of a whirlwind flies up to half of its fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks and then resumes its normal form. When a creature shares its space with the whirlwind for the first time during this movement that creature makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure the creature is carried inside the elementals space until the whirlwind ends taking 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for each 10 feet it is carried and falls prone at the end of the movement. The whirlwind can carry one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ape attacks twice with its fists.

action.name: Fists
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d10+5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 50/100 ft. one target. Hit: 26 (6d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The badger has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The bat can't use blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The bat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Day)
trait.text: If the boar takes 10 or less damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is instead reduced to 1 hit point.

action.name: Tusk
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage. If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage and the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failure. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points it is made stable but poisoned for 1 hour even if it regains hit points and it is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the snake can't constrict a different target.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws and can grapple one creature with each.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The crocodile attacks with its bite and its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the crocodile can't bite a different target.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one creature not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) bludgeoning damage and the target makes a DC 18 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: Siege Monster

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the elemental can't burrow or use Earths Embrace and its slam attacks are made with advantage against the grappled target.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit range 30/90 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fire Glands
trait.text: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

monster.name: Giant Fire Elemental - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Fire Form
trait.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Fiery Aura
trait.text: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the fire elemental takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Weakness
trait.text: The elemental takes 6 (1d12) cold damage if it enters a body of water or starts its turn in a body of water, is splashed with at least 5 gallons of water, or is hit by a water elementals slam attack.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An elemental doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 4) fire damage and the target suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Wildfire (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: The elemental moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can enter the spaces of hostile creatures but not end this movement there. When a creature shares its space with the elemental for the first time during this movement the creature is subject to the elementals Fiery Aura and the elemental can make a slam attack against that creature.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The frog makes a bite attack against a Small or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits and the frog has not swallowed another creature the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature has total cover from attacks from outside the frog it is blinded and restrained and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the beginning of each of the frogs turns. If the frog dies the target is no longer swallowed.

action.name: Vaulting Leap
action.text: The frog jumps up to 10 feet horizontally and 5 feet vertically. If its within 5 feet of a creature that it is not grappling at the end of this movement it may make a bite attack against that creature with advantage.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the goat moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target takes an additional 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage and makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: Camouflage
trait.text: The grick has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The grick can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 20 ft. one or two targets. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a creature it makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw. On a failure the creature is pulled to within 5 feet of the grick and grappled (escape DC 16). Until the grapple ends the creature is restrained. The grick can grapple up to two Medium or smaller creatures or one Large creature.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points the hyena can use its bonus action to move half its Speed and make a second bite attack.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The giant lanternfish radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The giant lanternfishs innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. At will: charm person, disguise self (humanoid form), major image, misty step, 1/day each: geas, hallucinatory terrain, hypnotic pattern, scrying

action.name: Dizzying Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: The target is magically charmed for 1 hour or until it takes damage. While charmed in this way it has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and ability checks.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger

action.name: Hypnotic Pattern (3rd-Level; S, Concentration)
action.text: A swirling pattern of light appears at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the pattern that can see it makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed the creature is incapacitated and its Speed is 0. The effect ends on a creature if it takes damage or if another creature uses an action to shake it out of its daze.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Camouflage

action.name: Tentacles

action.name: Sting

It can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

trait.text: The weasel has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.text: The spider can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The mouther can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Gibbering Mouths
trait.text: The mouther babbles constantly. A living non-aberration creature that starts its turn within 30 feet and can hear its gibbering makes a DC 10 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature is confused until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Reality Eater
trait.text: The ground within 15 feet of the mouther is the consistency of sucking mud and is difficult terrain to all creatures except the mouther. Each non-aberrant creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on its turn makes a DC 10 Strength saving throw. On a failure, its Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 10 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. If the target is killed by this attack it is absorbed into the mouther.

monster.name: Glabrezu - a5e
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The glabrezu radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The glabrezu makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 17). The glabrezu has two pincers each of which can grapple one target. While grappling a target a pincer can't attack a different target. If the same creature is grappled by both of the glabrezus pincers it must escape from each of them separately.

action.name: Wish
action.text: Once per 30 days the glabrezu can cast wish for a mortal using no material components. Before doing so it will demand that the mortal commit a terribly evil act or make a painful sacrifice.

trait.name: Combat Expertise
trait.text: The damage of the gladiators attacks includes a d6 expertise die.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gladiator makes two melee attacks with their spear or throws two javelins.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shield Block
reaction.text: If the gladiator is wielding a shield and can see their attacker, they add 3 to their AC against one melee or ranged attack that would hit them.

reaction.name: Shield Rush
reaction.text: The gladiator makes an attack with their shield. On a hit, the target makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnolls allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Aligned
trait.text: The gnoll radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Possessed
trait.text: If the gnoll demonfang is turned or affected by dispel evil and good or a similar effect, it transforms into an ordinary gnoll. Any damage it has taken carries over to its new form. If this damage exceeds its maximum hit points, it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gnoll attacks three times with its Charging Claw.

action.name: Charging Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage or 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage if this is the gnolls first attack on this target this turn. The gnoll may then move up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnolls allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gnoll attacks twice with its spear.

action.name: Chilling Laughter (Recharge 6)
action.text: The gnolls barking laughter drives allies into a frenzy. Each other creature of the gnolls choice within 30 feet that can hear it and has a Rampaging Bite bonus action can use its reaction to make a Rampaging Bite.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the goat moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage and makes a DC 10 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Throw Vial
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 20/40 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to douse the fire on a target ending all ongoing damage being dealt by alchemists fire. (You can substitute acid by altering the damage type.)

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The goblin attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Minions
action.text: Up to 3 goblins within 30 feet that can hear or see it use their reactions to make a single melee attack each.

action.name: Sabre
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Two goblin musketeers together can operate a musket
action.text: If one uses its action to assist the other gains the following additional action:

action.name: Musket
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 60/180 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Wall
action.text: The goblin and a goblin within 5 feet of it gain three-quarters cover.

trait.name: Goblin Skulker
trait.text: The goblin deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it attacks with advantage or when one of its allies is within 5 feet of its target and isnt incapacitated.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Silver Fire
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit range 60 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) fire damage and 7 (2d6) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to douse the fire on a target ending the ongoing damage.

action.name: Clinging Illusion
action.text: The warlock creates a magical illusion of an unmoving Medium or smaller object in a space it can see within 30 feet. The illusion can hide a smaller object in the same space. The illusion lasts 24 hours until a creature touches it or until the warlock uses Clinging Illusion again. A creature can take an action to make a DC 12 Investigation check to disbelieve the illusion. On a success the illusion appears transparent to the creature.

reaction.name: Quick Switch
reaction.text: When the warlock is hit by an attack, it magically teleports, switching places with a goblin ally within 30 feet. The goblin ally is hit by the triggering attack and suffers its effects.

monster.name: Gold Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Molten Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales molten gold in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Slowing Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or suffer disadvantage on weapon attack rolls for 1 minute. A weakened creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the attack deals an extra 6 (1d12) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure a creature is restrained as it begins to turn to stone. At the beginning of the gorgons next turn the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature is petrified. This petrification can be removed with greater restoration or similar magic.

monster.name: Gray Ooze - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

trait.name: Amorphous
trait.text: The ooze can pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Body
trait.text: A creature or a metal object that touches the ooze takes 5 (2d4) acid damage. A nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the black pudding corrodes after dealing damage, taking a permanent -1 penalty to damage rolls per hit. If this penalty reaches -5, the weapon is destroyed. Metal nonmagical ammunition is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the ooze is indistinguishable from wet stone.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the ooze has disadvantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
trait.text: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) acid damage. Nonmagical metal armor worn by the target corrodes taking a permanent -1 penalty to its AC protection per hit. If the penalty reduces the armors AC protection to 10 the armor is destroyed.

monster.name: Great Wyrm Black Dragon - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 22

trait.name: Ambusher
trait.text: When submerged in water, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks. If the dragon hits a creature that can't see it with its bite, it can deal piercing damage and grapple the target simultaneously.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to mud. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Ruthless (1/Round)
trait.text: After scoring a critical hit on its turn, the dragon can immediately make one claw attack.

trait.name: Concentrated Acid (1/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. For the next minute, the dragons acid becomes immensely more corrosive, ignoring acid resistance and treating acid immunity as acid resistance.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 19). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:fog cloud, pass without trace, legend lore, speak with dead, 1/day each:create undead, insect plague, time stop

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack it can use Acid Spit.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. Instead of dealing piercing damage the dragon can grapple the target (escape DC 23) and a Huge or smaller creature grappled in this way is restrained. While grappling a creature the dragon can't bite or use Acid Spit against another target.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Acid Spit
action.text: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save also takes 11 (2d10) ongoing acid damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales sizzling acid in a 90-foot-long 10-foot-wide line. Each creature in that area makes a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw taking 85 (19d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save is blinded until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Darkness
legendary.text: The dragon creates a 40-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness originating from a point it can see within 120 feet. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness. The darkness lasts for 1 minute or until the dragon uses this action again.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 19 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

monster.name: Great Wyrm Blue Dragon - a5e
monster.speed: 40 ft., Burrow: 40 ft., Fly: 80 ft., Swim: 40 ft.
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

trait.name: Desert Farer
trait.text: The dragon ignores difficult terrain or obscurement caused by sand or gravel, even while flying. Additionally, it ignores the effects of extreme heat.

trait.name: Dune Splitter
trait.text: The dragon can remain submerged in sand and gravel for up to 4 hours. It has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in this way, and Large or smaller creatures within 20 feet of its hiding place when it emerges must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to sand. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: High Voltage (1/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. After doing so, the air around it becomes electrically charged. A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon or moves within 15 feet of it for the first time on a turn makes a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it takes 11 (2d10) lightning damage and can't take reactions until the start of its next turn. Creatures in metal armor or wielding metal weapons have disadvantage on this saving throw.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 21). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:blur, silent image, blight, hypnotic pattern, 1/day each:control water, mirage arcane,antipathy/sympathy

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack it can use Arc Lightning.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Arc Lightning
action.text: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success. Also on a failure the lightning jumps. Choose a creature within 30 feet of the target that hasnt been hit by this ability on this turn and repeat the effect against it possibly causing the lightning to jump again.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales a 120-foot-long 10-foot-wide line of lightning. Each creature in that area makes a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw taking 94 (17d10) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save can't take reactions until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Quake
action.text: While touching natural ground the dragon sends pulses of thunder rippling through it. Creatures within 30 feet make a DC 24 Strength saving throw taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and falling prone on a failure. If a Large or smaller creature that fails the save is standing on sand it also sinks partially becoming restrained as well. A creature restrained in this way can spend half its movement to escape.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Quake (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The dragon uses its Quake action.

monster.name: Great Wyrm Gold Dragon - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

trait.name: Gleaming Brilliance (1/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. After doing so, the dragons golden scales melt, coating its body in a layer of molten gold. A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, some of its scales fall away, forming pools of molten gold. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Valor
trait.text: Creatures of the dragons choice within 30 feet gain a +3 bonus to saving throws and are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 25). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:bless, healing word,banishment, greater restoration, 1/day each:divine word, hallow, holy aura

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks with its bite and twice with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Greatsword (Humanoid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

action.name: Molten Spit
action.text: The dragon targets one creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 27 (5d10) fire damage on a failure or half on a success. Liquid gold pools in a 5-foot-square occupied by the creature and remains hot for 1 minute. A creature that ends its turn in the gold or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 22 (4d10) fire damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Molten Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales molten gold in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw taking 88 (16d10) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw is covered in a shell of rapidly cooling gold reducing its Speed to 0. A creature can use an action to break the shell ending the effect.

action.name: Weakening Breath
action.text: The dragon exhales weakening gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on weapon attack rolls for 1 minute. A weakened creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: The dragon magically takes the shape of a humanoid or beast or changes back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (dragons choice). In the new form the dragons stats are unchanged except for its size. It can't use Molten Spit Breath Weapons Tail Attack or Wing Attack except in dragon form. In beast form it can attack only with its bite and claws if appropriate to its form. If the beast form is Large or smaller the reach of these attacks is reduced to 5 feet. In humanoid form it can attack only with its greatsword.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

reaction.name: Vanguard
reaction.text: When another creature the dragon can see within 20 feet is hit by an attack, the dragon deflects the attack, turning the hit into a miss.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 25 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Fiery Reprisal (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The dragon uses Molten Spit against the last creature to deal damage to it.

monster.name: Great Wyrm Green Dragon - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 23

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn into dry leaves and blow away. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 19 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Woodland Stalker
trait.text: When in a forested area, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks. Additionally, when it speaks in such a place, it can project its voice such that it seems to come from all around, allowing it to remain hidden while speaking.

trait.name: Blood Toxicity (While Bloodied)
trait.text: The first time each turn a creature hits the dragon with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, that creature makes a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failure.

trait.name: Venomous Resurgence (1/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. After doing so, it emanates a green gas that extends in a 15-foot radius around it. When a creature enters this area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it makes a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature with resistance to poison damage loses it, and a creature without resistance or immunity to poison damage becomes vulnerable to poison damage instead. Either effect lasts until the start of the creatures next turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 19). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:animal messenger, tongues, modify memory, scrying, 1/day:mass suggestion, telepathic bond,glibness

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack it can Spit Poison.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Spit Poison
action.text: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save is also poisoned for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns taking 11 (2d10) poison damage on a failure and ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 22 Constitution saving throw taking 80 (23d6) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature with immunity to poison damage that fails the save takes no damage but its poison immunity is reduced to resistance for the next hour.

action.name: Honeyed Words
action.text: The dragons words sow doubt in the minds of those who hear them. One creature within 60 feet who can hear and understand the dragon makes a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the creature must use its reaction if available to make one attack against a creature of the dragons choice with whatever weapon it has to do so moving up to its speed as part of the reaction if necessary. It need not use any special class features (such as Sneak Attack or Divine Smite) when making this attack. If it can't get in a position to attack the creature it moves as far as it can toward the target before regaining its senses. A creature immune to being charmed is immune to this ability.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Honeyed Words
legendary.text: The dragon uses Honeyed Words.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 19 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

monster.name: Great Wyrm Red Dragon - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to charcoal. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Searing Heat
trait.text: A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack for the first time on a turn takes 14 (4d6) fire damage.

trait.name: Volcanic Tyrant
trait.text: The dragon is immune to the effects of poisonous gases caused by volcanic environments. It also ignores difficult terrain caused by lava.

trait.name: Seething Rage
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. Its inner flame erupts, burning brightly in its eyes and mouth. After taking damage from its Searing Heat ability, a creature with resistance to fire damage loses it, and a creature with immunity to fire damage reduces it to resistance. Either effect lasts until the start of the creatures next turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 22). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:command, hold person, glyph of warding, wall of fire, 1/day each:antimagic field, dominate monster, storm of vengeance

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack it can Spit Fire.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Cruel Tyranny
action.text: The dragon snarls and threatens its minions driving them to immediate action. The dragon chooses one creature it can see and that can hear the dragon. The creature uses its reaction to make one weapon attack with advantage. If the dragon is bloodied it can use this ability on three minions at once.

action.name: Spit Fire
action.text: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save also takes 11 (2d10) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales a blast of fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw taking 98 (28d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw also takes 11 (2d10) ongoing fire damage. While affected by this ongoing damage it is frightened of the dragon. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

reaction.name: Taskmaster
reaction.text: When a creature within 60 feet fails an ability check or saving throw, the dragon roars a command to it. The creature can roll a d10 and add it to the result of the roll, possibly turning the failure into a success.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cruel Tyranny
legendary.text: The dragon uses its Cruel Tyranny action.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 22 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

monster.name: Great Wyrm White Dragon - a5e
monster.speed: 40 ft., Burrow: 40 ft., Fly: 80 ft., Swim: 40 ft.
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 23

trait.name: Cold Mastery
trait.text: The dragons movement and vision is not hindered by cold, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the dragon can choose to burrow through snow and ice without leaving a trace.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to ice. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armor Class is reduced to 18 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Heart of Winter
trait.text: When the dragon is first bloodied, it immediately recharges its breath weapon, if its not already available. Additionally, the damage from the dragons Raging Storm is doubled.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 18). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:dominate beast, fire shield, animal friendship, sleet storm, 1/day each:control weather, wall of ice, reverse gravity

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack it can Spit Ice.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit reach 20 ft. one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Spit Ice
action.text: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet forcing it to make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target takes 22 (4d10) cold damage and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a success it takes half damage.

action.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales a 90-foot cone of frost. Each creature in the area makes a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it takes 66 (19d6) cold damage and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a success it takes half damage.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
reaction.text: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Roar
legendary.text: Each creature of the dragons choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
legendary.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Raging Storm (1/Day
legendary.text: For 1 minute, gusts of sleet emanate from the dragon in a 40-foot-radius sphere, spreading around corners. The area is lightly obscured, the ground is difficult terrain, and nonmagical flames are extinguished. The first time a creature other than the dragon moves on its turn while in the area, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage and fall prone (or fall if it is flying).

trait.name: Inscrutable
trait.text: The sphinx is immune to divination and to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Insight checks made to determine the sphinxs intentions are made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
trait.text: Each greater sphinx wears a piece of jewelry, such as a crown, headdress, or armlet. When the greater sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, its jewelry shatters. The sphinx can create a new piece of jewelry when it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The sphinxs spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, minor illusion, spare the dying, 3/day each: dispel magic, identify, lesser restoration, remove curse, scrying, tongues, zone of truth, 1/day each: contact other plane, flame strike, freedom of movement, greater restoration, legend lore, heroes feast

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The sphinx attacks twice with its claw.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Dispel Magic (3rd-Level; V, S)
action.text: The sphinx scours the magic from one creature object or magical effect within 120 feet that it can see. A spell ends if it was cast with a 3rd-level or lower spell slot. For spells using a 4th-level or higher spell slot the sphinx makes a Wisdom ability check (DC 10 + the spells level) for each one ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V, S)
action.text: A column of divine flame fills a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Roar (3/Day)
action.text: The sphinx unleashes a magical roar. Each time it roars before taking a long rest its roar becomes more powerful. Each creature within 300 feet of the sphinx that can hear it makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw with the following consequences:

action.name: First Roar: A creature that fails the saving throw is frightened for 1 minute
action.text: It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Second Roar: A creature that fails the saving throw takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage and is frightened for 1 minute
action.text: On a success the creature takes half damage. While frightened by this roar the creature is paralyzed. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Third Roar: A creature that fails the saving throw takes 44 (8d10) thunder damage and is knocked prone
action.text: On a success the creature takes half damage.

monster.name: Green Dragon Wyrmling - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Woodland Stalker
trait.text: When in a forested area, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, invisibility, minor illusion, 1/day: geas

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hag attacks with its claws and uses Hex.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Hex (Gaze)
action.text: A creature within 60 feet that is not already under a hags hex makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under an obligation to the hag automatically fails this saving throw. On a failed saving throw the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll 1d4:
Charm Hex. The target is charmed by the hag.
Fear Hex. The target is frightened of the hag.
Ill Fortune Hex. The hag magically divines the targets activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft or downtime activity the hag can cause the activity to fail.
Sleep Hex. The target falls unconscious. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks uses Hex or casts a spell.

trait.name: Camouflage
