trait.text: The grick has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The grick can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends the grick can't attack a different target with its tentacles.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The griffon has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The griffon attacks once with its beak and once with its talons.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage or 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage if the griffon started its turn at least 20 feet above the target and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the griffon can't attack a different target with its talons.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The grimalkin has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Claws (True Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage. If the grimalkin moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the target makes a DC 12 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Grimlock - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 30 ft., or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

trait.name: Camouflage
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Spiked Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Throttle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12) and can't breathe. Until this grapple ends the grimlock can't use any attack other than throttle and only against the grappled target and it makes this attack with advantage.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Grimlock Technical - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 30 ft., or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

trait.name: Camouflage
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Lightning Stick
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Throttle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12) and can't breathe. Until this grapple ends the grimlock can't use any attack other than throttle and only against the grappled target and it makes this attack with advantage.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Silenced Blunderbuss
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage. The blunderbuss fires with a cloud of smoke and a quiet pop that can be heard from 30 feet away. It requires an action to reload the blunderbuss.

action.name: Smoke Bomb (3/Day)
action.text: The grimlock throws a vial at a point up to 20 feet away. The area within 30 feet of that point is heavily obscured for 1 minute or until cleared by a strong wind.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Guards patrol city gates or accompany caravans
action.text: Most guards are not as well trained or equipped as army soldiers but their presence can deter bandits and opportunistic monsters.

trait.name: Area Vulnerability
trait.text: The squad takes double damage from any effect that targets an area.

trait.name: Squad Dispersal
trait.text: When the squad is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 2 (1d4) guards with 5 hit points each.

trait.name: Squad
trait.text: The squad is composed of 5 or more guards. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects. The squad can move through any opening large enough for one Medium creature without squeezing.

action.name: Spears
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 feet one target. Hit: 17 (5d6) piercing damage or half damage if the squad is bloodied.

action.name: Guard squads patrol city streets and accompany caravans along trade routes

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Forbiddance
trait.text: The nagas lair is under the forbiddance spell. Until it is dispelled, creatures in the lair can't teleport or use planar travel. Fiends and undead that are not the nagas allies take 27 (5d10) radiant damage when they enter or start their turn in the lair.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
trait.text: If it dies, the naga gains a new body in 1d6 days, regaining all its hit points. This trait can be removed with a wish spell.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The naga is an 11th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16). The naga has the following cleric spells prepared which it can cast with only vocalized components: Cantrips (at will): mending thaumaturgy 1st-level (4 slots): command cure wounds 2nd-level (3 slots): calm emotions hold person 3rd-level (3 slots) clairvoyance create food and water 4th-level (3 slots): divination freedom of movement 5th-level (2 slots): flame strike geas 6th-level (1 slot): forbiddance

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. The target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw taking 35 (10d6) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Spit Poison
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 20/60 ft. one creature. Hit: The target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw taking 35 (10d6) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Command (1st-Level; V)
action.text: One living creature within 60 feet that the naga can see and that can hear and understand it makes a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target uses its next turn to move as far from the naga as possible avoiding hazardous terrain.

action.name: Hold Person (2nd-Level; V, Concentration)
action.text: One humanoid the naga can see within 60 feet makes a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V)
action.text: A column of divine flame fills a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Half-Red Dragon Veteran - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The veteran makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 100/400 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The veteran exhales a blast of fire that fills a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature who fails the saving throw also suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. At the end of each of its turns it can repeat the saving throw ending the ongoing damage on a success. This fire can also be put out in typical ways such as immersion in water and a creature who uses an action to drop prone can put out the fire with a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw.

reaction.name: Off-Hand Counter
reaction.text: When the veteran is missed by a melee attack by an attacker it can see within 5 feet, the veteran makes a shortsword attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Tactical Movement
reaction.text: Until the end of the veterans turn, its Speed is halved and its movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Half-Shadow Dragon Assassin - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

trait.name: Assassinate
trait.text: During the first turn of combat, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasnt acted. On a successful hit, each creature of the assassins choice that can see the assassins attack is rattled until the end of the assassins next turn.

trait.name: Dangerous Poison
trait.text: As part of making an attack, the assassin can apply a dangerous poison to their weapon (included below). The assassin carries 3 doses of this poison. A single dose can coat one melee weapon or up to 5 pieces of ammunition.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the assassin makes a Dexterity saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, they take no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: The assassin deals an extra 21 (6d6) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the assassins target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin while the assassin doesnt have disadvantage on the attack.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Anguished Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The assassin exhales a shadowy maelstrom of anguish in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw taking 22 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The harpy attacks twice with its claw.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The hawk has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The hound has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The hound radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The hound has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hounds allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Hezrou - a5e
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The hezrou radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hezrou makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the hezrou can't bite another target.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The hezrou makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits and the hezrou has not swallowed another creature the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature has total cover from attacks from outside the hezrou it is blinded and restrained and it takes 17 (5d6) ongoing acid damage while swallowed.

action.name: If a swallowed creature deals 25 or more damage to the hezrou in a single turn, or if the hezrou dies, the hezrou vomits up the creature
Darkness
action.text: Magical darkness spreads from a point within 30 feet filling a 15-foot-radius sphere and spreading around corners. It remains for 1 minute until the hezrou dismisses it or until the hezrou uses this ability again. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

reaction.name: Stench (1/Day)
reaction.text: When hit by a melee attack, the hezrou emits a cloud of foul-smelling poison gas in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in the area makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success

action.name: Rapier
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit range 60 ft. one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage and the targets Speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the nobles next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: If the noble is wielding a melee weapon and can see their attacker, they add 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them.

reaction.name: High elf nobles pride themselves on the cultural accomplishments of their waning or extinct empires
reaction.text: Highly educated, many high elf nobles see themselves as peacemakers, leaders, or preservers of ancient traditions.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The priest is an 11th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15 +7 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): light sacred flame thaumaturgy 1st-level (4 slots): ceremony detect evil and good healing word 2nd-level (3 slots): augury hold person zone of truth 3rd-level (3 slots): daylight remove curse 4th-level (3 slots): divination guardian of faith revivify 5th-level (2 slots): flame strike greater restoration raise dead 6th-level (1 slots): heal

action.name: Mace
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. On a hit the priest can expend a spell slot to deal 7 (2d6) radiant damage plus an extra 3 (1d6) radiant damage for each level of the spell slot expended above 1st.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
action.text: One creature the priest can see within 60 feet makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 13 (3d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

action.name: Hold Person (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
action.text: One humanoid the priest can see within 60 feet makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Guardian of Faith (4th-Level; V)
action.text: A Large indistinct spectral guardian appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet and remains for 8 hours. Creatures of the priests choice that move to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 20 radiant or necrotic damage (high priests choice) on a failed save or half damage on a success. The spell ends when the guardian has dealt 60 total damage.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V, S, M)
action.text: A column of divine flame fills a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
trait.text: The pugilists AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The pugilist attacks three times with their fists.

action.name: Fists
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grab
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends the pugilist can't grapple a different target.

action.name: Pin
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one grappled creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target is restrained until the grapple ends.

action.name: Body Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one grappled creature. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the grapple ends.

reaction.name: Opportune Jab
reaction.text: If a creature attempts to grapple the pugilist, the pugilist attacks that creature with their fists.

reaction.name: The hill dwarven sport of wrestling has grown wildly popular
Haymaker (1/Day)
reaction.text: The pugilist attacks with their fists. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

reaction.name: Head Shot (1/Day)
reaction.text: The pugilist attacks with their fists. On a hit, the target makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is stunned until the end of the pugilists next turn.

trait.name: Gullible
trait.text: The giant makes Insight checks with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant attacks twice with its greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. In lieu of a rock the giant can throw a grappled Medium or smaller creature up to 30 feet. On a hit the target and the thrown creature both take 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. On a miss only the thrown creature takes the damage. The thrown creature falls prone in an unoccupied space 5 feet from the target.

action.name: Greatclub Sweep (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: Each creature within 10 feet makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure a creature takes 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage is pushed 10 feet away from the giant and falls prone.

trait.name: Gullible
trait.text: The giant makes Insight checks with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant attacks twice with its greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit range 60/240 ft. one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. In lieu of a rock the giant can throw a grappled Medium or smaller creature up to 30 feet. On a hit the target and the thrown creature both take 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. On a miss only the thrown creature takes the damage. The thrown creature falls prone in an unoccupied space 5 feet from the target.

action.name: Greatclub Sweep (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: Each creature within 10 feet makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure a creature takes 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage is pushed 10 feet away from the giant and falls prone.

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The hippogriff has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: Formation Movement
trait.text: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated, its movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage or 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Formation Movement
trait.text: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated, its movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hobgoblin attacks twice with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Officers Command (1/Day)
action.text: The hobgoblin inspires creatures of its choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand it and that have a Challenge Rating of 2 or lower. For the next minute inspired creatures gain an expertise die on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Officers Command at a time.

trait.name: Formation Movement
trait.text: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated, its movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Bloodied Rage
trait.text: While bloodied, the warlord can attack four times with its greatsword or twice with its javelin when it uses Multiattack but no longer gains the benefit of its Military Training trait.

trait.name: Elite Recovery
trait.text: At the end of each of its turns, while bloodied, the hobgoblin can end one condition or effect on itself. It can do this even when unconscious or incapacitated.

trait.name: Military Training
trait.text: The hobgoblin has advantage on ability checks to make a tactical, strategic, or political decision.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hobgoblin attacks twice with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Officers Command (1/Day)
action.text: The hobgoblin inspires creatures of its choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand it and that have a Challenge Rating of 2 or lower. For the next minute inspired creatures gain an expertise die on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Officers Command at a time.

trait.name: Aura of Courage
trait.text: While the knight is conscious, allies within 10 feet are immune to being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight attacks twice with their greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (2d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Lance (Mounted Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage. If the knight moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack they deal an extra 13 (2d12) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. This attack is made at disadvantage against targets within 5 feet.

action.name: Lay On Hands (1/Day)
action.text: The knight touches a willing creature or themself and restores 30 hit points.

action.name: Knightly Inspiration (1/Day)
action.text: The knight inspires creatures of their choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand them. For the next minute inspired creatures gain an expertise die (1d4) on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Knightly Inspiration at a time and the knight cannot target themselves.

action.name: Holy knights are dedicated to a sacred temple or a righteous principle
action.text: While they obey the mandates of the monarchs they serve they are sworn to fight evil wherever they find it.

monster.name: Homunculus - a5e
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
trait.text: While they are on the same plane, the homunculus and its creator can communicate telepathically at any distance.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage and the target makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it is poisoned. At the end of its next turn it repeats the saving throw. On a success the effect ends. On a failure it falls unconscious for 1 minute. If it takes damage or a creature uses an action to shake it awake it wakes up and the poisoned effect ends.

monster.name: Horde Demon - a5e
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The demon radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Radiant Weakness
trait.text: If the demon takes radiant damage while it is bloodied, it is frightened for 1 minute.

trait.name: Varied Shapes
trait.text: Each horde demon has a unique combination of attacks and powers. Roll 1d10 once or twice, rerolling duplicates, or choose one or two features from the following table. A horde demons features determine the attacks it can make.

trait.name: 1 Bat Head
trait.text: The demon emits a 15-foot cone of cacophonous sound. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) thunder damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: 2 Bulging Eyes (Gaze)
trait.text: A creature within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage and is frightened until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: 3 Claws
trait.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: 4 Fangs
trait.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: 5 Goat Horns
trait.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw, falling prone on a failure.

trait.name: 6 Lamprey Mouth
trait.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the lamprey mouth attack can be used only on this target and automatically hits.

trait.name: 7 Porcupine Quills
trait.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: 8 Scorpion Tail Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft
trait.text: , one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

trait.name: 9 Tentacle Arms Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft
trait.text: , one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the tentacle arms attack can only be used on this target.

trait.name: 10 Whispering Mouth
trait.text: The demon targets a creature within 30 feet that can hear it. The target makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and is magically cursed until the start of the demons next turn. While cursed, the demons attacks against the target are made with advantage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws against the demons Whispering Mouth.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The demon makes two attacks using any attack granted by its Varied Shapes trait.

monster.name: Horde Demon Band - a5e
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Area Vulnerability
trait.text: The band takes double damage from any effect that targets an area.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The band radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Band
trait.text: The band is composed of 5 or more horde demons. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects. The band can move through any opening large enough for one Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Band Dispersal
trait.text: When the band is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 2 (1d4) horde demons with 26 hit points each.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The band attacks twice.

action.name: Mob Attack
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 50 (10d6 + 15) slashing damage or half damage if the band is bloodied.

monster.name: Horde of Shadows - a5e
monster.resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; damage from nonmagical weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Amorphous
trait.text: The horde can pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Area Vulnerability
trait.text: The horde takes double damage from any effect that targets an area.

trait.name: Horde Dispersal
trait.text: When the horde is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 2 (1d4) shadows, each of which are bloodied.

trait.name: Horde
trait.text: The horde is composed of 5 or more shadows. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
trait.text: While in sunlight, the horde has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Undead Nature
trait.text: The horde doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The horde makes up to three claw attacks but no more than one against each target.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) necrotic damage and the target makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is cursed until it finishes a short or long rest or is the subject of remove curse or a similar spell. While cursed the target makes attack rolls Strength checks and Strength saving throws with disadvantage. If the target dies while cursed a new undead shadow rises from the corpse in 1d4 hours the corpse no longer casts a natural shadow and the target can't be raised from the dead until the new shadow is destroyed.

monster.name: Horned Devil - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The devil makes two attacks with its fork and one with its tail. It can replace any melee attack with Hurl Flame.

action.name: Fork
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or construct it makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure it receives an infernal wound and takes 11 (2d10) ongoing piercing damage. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack the ongoing damage increases by 11 (2d10). A creature can spend an action to make a DC 12 Medicine check ending the ongoing damage on a success. At least 1 hit point of magical healing also ends the ongoing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit range 150 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is an unattended flammable object or a creature it catches fire taking 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to extinguish this fire.

action.name: Inferno (1/Day, While Bloodied)
action.text: The devil waves its fork igniting a trail of roaring flame. Any creature within 10 feet of the devil makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 49 (14d6) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Pin (1/Day)
reaction.text: When a creature misses the devil with a melee attack, the devil makes a fork attack against that creature. On a hit, the target is impaled by the fork and grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the devil can't make fork attacks or use Inferno, but the target takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage at the beginning of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The centaur attacks with its pike and its hooves.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage or 10 (2d6 + 3) damage if the centaur moved at least 30 feet towards the target before the attack.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage the centaurs movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the centaurs turn.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit range 80/320 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadeye Shot (1/Day)
action.text: The centaur makes a shortbow attack with advantage.

monster.name: Hound Guardian - a5e
monster.immune: poison; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The guardian has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Constructed Nature
trait.text: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure.

reaction.name: Protective Bite
reaction.text: When a creature within 5 feet hits the guardians owner with a melee attack, the guardian bites the attacker.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The shark breathes only water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage. On a hit the shark can use a bonus action to make a second bite attack.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: When the hydra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, its heads lose coordination. It is rattled until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
trait.text: While the hydra has more than one head, it has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
trait.text: For each head it has, the hydra can take one reaction per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Regenerating Heads
trait.text: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in one turn, one of its heads dies. If all of its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows 2 heads for each head that was killed since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn.

trait.name: Toxic Secretions
trait.text: Water within 1 mile of the hydras lair is poisoned. A creature other than the hydra that is immersed in the water or drinks the water makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is poisoned for 24 hours. On a success, the creature is immune to this poison for 24 hours.

trait.name: Wakeful
trait.text: When some of the hydras heads are asleep, others are awake.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hydra bites once with each of its heads.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

legendary.name: The hydra can take 2 legendary actions
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Rush
legendary.text: The hydra moves or swims up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If this movement would pass through the space of creatures that are not incapacitated or prone, each creature makes a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature is knocked prone and the hydra can enter its space without treating it as difficult terrain. On a success, the hydra can't enter the creatures space, and the hydras movement ends. If this movement ends while the hydra is sharing a space with a creature, the creature is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space.

legendary.name: Wrap
legendary.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained until this grappled ends. The hydra can grapple one creature for each of its heads. When one of the hydras heads is killed while it is grappling a creature, the creature that killed the head can choose one creature to free from the grapple.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points the hyena can use its bonus action to move half its Speed and make a second bite attack.

monster.name: Ice Devil - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The devil makes one bite attack and one claws attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. If the target is a creature it makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
action.text: The devil magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat 1 foot thick and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12 30 hit points vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to cold necrotic poison and psychic damage.

action.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creatures choice)
action.text: The creature then makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw taking 49 (14d6) cold damage on a successful save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood (1/Day)
reaction.text: When a creature within 60 feet that the devil can see hits it with a ranged attack or includes it in a spells area, the creature makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 (3d6) cold damage and is slowed until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Tail
reaction.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the mephit dies, it explodes into ice shards. Each creature within 5 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While motionless, the mephit is indistinguishable from a shard of ice.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: A mephit doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

action.name: Fog (1/Day)
action.text: The mephit exhales a cloud of fog creating a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on the mephit. The fog is heavily obscured to non-mephits. The fog cloud is immobile spreads around corners and remains for 10 minutes or until dispersed by a strong wind.

action.name: Freezing Breath (1/Day)
action.text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of ice. Each creature in the area makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw taking 5 (2d4) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Ice Worm - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 15

trait.name: Tunneler
trait.text: The worm can tunnel through earth and solid rock, leaving behind a 10-foot-diameter tunnel.

trait.name: Sense Heat
trait.text: The worm senses warm-blooded creatures and warm objects within 60 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The worm attacks two different targets with its bite and its tail stinger.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 25 (3d10 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature it makes a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target is swallowed. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained it has total cover from attacks from outside the worm and it takes 24 (7d6) acid damage at the start of each of the worms turns.

action.name: If a swallowed creature deals 35 or more damage to the worm in a single turn, or if the worm dies, the worm vomits up all swallowed creatures
Tail Stinger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit reach 10 ft. one creature. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 19 Constitution saving throw taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Fighting Retreat
reaction.text: When a creature makes an opportunity attack on the worm, the worm attacks with either its bite or its tail stinger.

monster.name: Imp - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The imps darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Ventriloquism
trait.text: The imp can perfectly imitate any voice it has heard. It can make its voice appear to originate from any point within 30 feet.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The imp radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Sting (Bite While Shapeshifted)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Shapeshift
action.text: The imp magically changes its form into a rat (speed 20 ft.) raven (20 ft. fly 60 ft.) or spider (20 ft. climb 20 ft.) or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it carries is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monster.name: Imp Familiar - a5e
monster.resist: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

trait.name: Devils Sight
trait.text: The imps darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Ventriloquism
trait.text: The imp can perfectly imitate any voice it has heard. It can make its voice appear to originate from any point within 30 feet.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
trait.text: The imp radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Familiar
trait.text: The imp can communicate telepathically with its master while they are within 1 mile of each other. When the imp is within 10 feet of its master, its master shares its Magic Resistance trait.

action.name: Sting (Bite While Shapeshifted)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Shapeshift
action.text: The imp magically changes its form into a rat (speed 20 ft.) raven (20 ft. fly 60 ft.) or spider (20 ft. climb 20 ft.) or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it carries is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer - a5e
monster.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 12
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Ego Whip
action.text: The intellect devourer targets a creature with a brain within 60 feet. The target makes a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure it takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage and is rattled for 1 minute. If it is already rattled by Ego Whip it is also stunned. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending both effects on a success.

action.name: Body Thief
action.text: The intellect devourer enters the nose and mouth of an incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet. The target must be Small or larger have a brain and have an Intelligence of 4 or higher. The intellect devourer eats the targets brain and takes control of the target. The intellect devourer leaves the body if the target is reduced to 0 hit points if the target is affected by dispel evil and good or another effect that ends possession or voluntarily as a bonus action. A creature killed by the intellect devourer can be restored to life by resurrection or similar magic.

action.name: While the intellect devourer is in control of the target, the intellect devourer retains its own Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, its telepathy, and its knowledge of Deep Speech
action.text: It otherwise uses the targets statistics including proficiencies languages class features and spells. It has vague knowledge about the targets life but must make a DC 15 Intelligence check to recall specific facts.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker - a5e
monster.conditionImmune: fatigue, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Invisibility
trait.text: The stalker is invisible. Creatures that see invisible creatures see the stalker as a vague humanoid outline.

trait.name: Wind Tracker
trait.text: If given a quarry by a summoner, the stalker knows the direction and distance to the quarry as long as they are on the same plane of existence and not sealed from each other by a barrier that doesnt allow air to pass.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
trait.text: An invisible stalker doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The stalker makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. On a critical hit the target is pushed up to 15 feet and knocked prone.

monster.name: Iron Guardian - a5e
monster.immune: fire, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fire Absorption
trait.text: When the guardian is subjected to fire damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Constructed Nature
trait.text: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The guardian makes two sword attacks.

action.name: Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The guardian exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Deflection
reaction.text: When missed by a ranged attack by a creature the guardian can see, the guardian redirects the attack against a creature within 60 feet that it can see. The original attacker must reroll the attack against the new target.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The jackal has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: If the jackalope is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the jackalope instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The jackalope has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The jackalope can imitate sounds it hears frequently, such as a simple phrase or an animal noise. Recognizing the sounds as imitation requires a DC 14 Insight check.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage. If the jackalope moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
reaction.text: When an attacker the jackalope can see hits it with an attack, the jackalope halves the attacks damage against it.

reaction.name: Nimble Escape
reaction.text: The jackalope takes the Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The jackalwere radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The jackalwere has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The jackalwere has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the jackalweres allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

trait.name: Truth Aversion
trait.text: The jackalwere must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw to make a true statement. On a failure, it tells an unpremeditated lie.

action.name: Bite (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze (Gaze, Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: One creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere makes a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the target is magically charmed. At the beginning of the jackalweres next turn the target repeats the saving throw. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes. Both the charmed and unconscious conditions end if the target takes damage or a creature within reach of the target uses an action to shake the target back to its senses. If the target successfully saves against Sleep Gaze it is immune to Sleep Gaze for 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to charm arent affected by it.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
trait.text: The jackalwere radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The jackalwere has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The jackalwere has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the jackalweres allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

trait.name: Truth Aversion
trait.text: The jackalwere must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw to make a true statement. On a failure, it tells an unpremeditated lie.

action.name: Bite (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze (Gaze, Hybrid Form Only)
action.text: One creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere makes a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the target is magically charmed. At the beginning of the jackalweres next turn the target repeats the saving throw. On a success the effect ends. On a failure the creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes. Both the charmed and unconscious conditions end if the target takes damage or a creature within reach of the target uses an action to shake the target back to its senses. If the target successfully saves against Sleep Gaze it is immune to Sleep Gaze for 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to charm arent affected by it.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The jackalwere makes two scimitar attacks or makes one scimitar attack and uses Sleep Gaze.

action.name: Strangle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 10 ft. one Medium or smaller creature that is surprised grappled by the kech or that can't see the kech. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is pulled 5 feet towards the kech and grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends the kech automatically hits with the Strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Stealthy Sneak
action.text: The kech moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then attempt to hide.

trait.name: Detect Alignment
trait.text: The khalkos can detect the presence of creatures within 30 feet that have an alignment trait, and knows the alignment of such creatures.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The khalkos has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Psionic Spellcasting
trait.text: The khalkoss spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

action.name: Chaos Pheromones
action.text: The khalkos emits a cloud of pheromones in a 20-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners. Each non-khalkos creature in the area makes a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw. Creatures with an alignment trait make this save with disadvantage. On a failure the creature is confused for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it it is immune to Chaos Pheromones for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Psionic Sting
action.text: The khalkos targets a creature within 30 feet forcing it to make a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Shield
reaction.text: When the khalkos is hit by an attack made by a creature that it can see or sense with its Detect Alignment trait, it gains a +4 bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

reaction.name: Brain Jab
reaction.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature with a brain and an Intelligence of 6 or higher. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target becomes diseased with brain larvae. Once the khalkos has used this attack successfully, it can't use it again for 24 hours.

trait.name: Detect Alignment
trait.text: The khalkos can detect the presence of creatures within 30 feet that have an alignment trait, and knows the alignment of such creatures.

action.name: Chaos Pheromones
action.text: The khalkos emits a cloud of pheromones into the air in a 10-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners. Each non-khalkos creature in the area makes a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure the creature is confused for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it it is immune to the chaos pheromones of khalkos spawn for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Sting
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The whale can't use blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The whale has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the whale can't bite another target and it has advantage on bite attacks against the creature it is grappling.

trait.name: Divine Grace
trait.text: If the empyrean makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure. Furthermore, while wearing medium armor, the empyrean adds its full Dexterity bonus to its Armor Class (already included).

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The empyreans innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: charm person, command, telekinesis, 3/day: flame strike, hold monster, lightning bolt, 1/day: commune, greater restoration, heroes feast, plane shift (self only, can't travel to or from the Material Plane)

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 38 (8d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage and the target makes a DC 25 Strength saving throw. On a failure the target is pushed up to 30 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level; V, S)
action.text: A bolt of lightning 5 feet wide and 100 feet long arcs from the empyrean. Each creature in the area makes a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level; V, S)
action.text: A column of divine flame fills a 10-foot-radius 40-foot-high cylinder within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw taking 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Hold Monster (5th-Level; V, S, Concentration)
action.text: One creature the empyrean can see within 60 feet makes a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: The empyrean can take 1 legendary action
legendary.text: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.text: The empyrean makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cast Spell
legendary.text: The empyrean casts a spell. The empyrean can't use this option if it has cast a spell since the start of its last turn.

legendary.name: Fly
legendary.text: The empyrean flies up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Shout (Recharge 5-6)
legendary.text: Each creature within 120 feet that can hear the empyrean makes a DC 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 24 (7d6) thunder damage and is stunned until the end of the empyreans next turn. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight attacks twice with their greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Lance (Mounted Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage. If the knight moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack they deal an extra 6 (1d12) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw falling prone on a failure. This attack is made at disadvantage against targets within 5 feet.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 100/400 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Knightly Inspiration (1/Day)
action.text: The knight inspires creatures of their choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand them. For the next minute inspired creatures gain an expertise die (1d4) on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Knightly Inspiration at a time and the knight cannot target themselves.

action.name: The typical knight is a highly-trained, heavily-armored cavalry soldier who has sworn allegiance to a noble, monarch, or faith
action.text: Not every knight however is forged from the same iron. Some knights fight on foot or on griffon-back and some owe allegiance to none but themselves.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The knight captain has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Superior Heavy Armor Master
trait.text: While wearing heavy armor, the knight captain reduces bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage they take from nonmagical weapons by 5.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight captain attacks four times.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Composite Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit range 150/600 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Command the Attack (1/Day)
action.text: The knight captain issues a command to all nonhostile creatures within 30 feet. Creatures who can see or hear the knight captain can use their reaction to make a single weapon attack with advantage.

action.name: Knightly Inspiration (1/Day)
action.text: The knight captain inspires creatures of their choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand them. For the next minute inspired creatures gain an expertise die (1d4) on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Knightly Inspiration at a time and the knight captain cannot target themselves.

action.name: Knight captains are battle-hardened warriors with countless victories to their names
action.text: Their mere presence inspires even the most novice warrior and their peerless swordplay can turn the tide of any battle.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the kobolds allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Shiv
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 3 (1d3 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit range 30/120 ft. one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Rally! (1/Day
reaction.text: When the kobold takes damage, it shouts a rallying cry. All kobolds within 30 feet that can hear it gain immunity to the frightened condition for 1 minute, and their next attack roll made before this effect ends deals an extra 1d4 damage.

trait.name: Draconic Smite

action.name: Multiattack (2/day)
action.text: The kobold sorcerer makes three flame bolt attacks.

action.name: Flame Bolt
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit range 120 ft. one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage.
